orig_text: The heat is rising inside the vault. Wait for the automatic failsafe to open the door.
tran_text: 金庫的溫度正在逐漸上升，等待安全機制來打開金庫的門。

orig_text: Use the code to open the panic room
Open the containers and look for the bomb case.
Figure out which engine it is
tran_text: 找出哪一個引擎是正確的

orig_text: Find a way into Santa's Workshop.
tran_text: 找到進入聖誕工坊的路。

orig_text: Enemies will see you from far away if you are standing up. Crouch to stay out of their view.
tran_text: 你站起來時敵人老遠也能發現你。請蹲下來迴避。

orig_text: Pick the C4 up and plant it around the dome
tran_text: 拿起 C4 並放置在圓頂附近

orig_text: Find the telephone pole connected to the mansion.
tran_text: 找到連接別墅的電線桿。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a weapon
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到武器

orig_text: Cannot enter the vehicle while Swan Song is active
The tiles in the chamber of the Diamond are pressure-sensitive, create a safe path across them.
tran_text: 鑽石之室的地板瓦片非常的敏感，製造一條安全的路徑來穿越。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a broken camera and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現被破壞的攝影機並通報警察

orig_text: Can only have one active camera loop
tran_text: 不能一次干擾超過一台攝影機

orig_text: Use the computer in the ship control room and enter the GPS coordinates.
tran_text: 在船隻控制室用電腦輸入 GPS 座標。

orig_text: Open up the Gensec truck and steal the gold
While in the Loadout screen, take a look at the "crew setup" to see what equipment your teammates are bringing.
tran_text: 在「裝備畫面」中，你可以從「隊伍管理」頁面中看到隊友帶了什麼武器和道具上場。

orig_text: You have been helped up by $HELPER;!
Get to the ziplines by the tunnel entrance.
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a broken voting machine and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現到損壞的投票機並通報警察

orig_text: Wait for the gas to dissipate
Escape through the canal route, quick!
Get to the crash site and help Mr. Pink out of the vehicle!
tran_text: 前往撞車地點並救出 Mr. Pink！

orig_text: There's a laptop somewhere on the grounds. Use the USB stick and hack it.
tran_text: 在附近有一部筆記本電腦，用隨身碟以駭入它。

orig_text: SWATS incoming! Use the planks from inside the warehouse to barricade the windows. Watch the entrances!
tran_text: SWATS 要攻堅了！利用貨倉內的木板來封死窗戶。小心出入口！

orig_text: The containers were locked when the alarm went off. Drill into the containers and look for the bomb case.
tran_text: 貨櫃會在警鈴響起後被鎖住。鑽進貨櫃尋找炸彈箱。

orig_text: Pick up the cage parts the pilot dropped, then assemble the cage at designated area.
tran_text: 撿起飛行員扔下的籠子部件, 接著在預定區域組裝籠子.

orig_text: Ammunition is more important than you think. Prioritize Special Enemies, such as Medics, Cloakers, Tasers and Bulldozers.
tran_text: 彈藥充足與否足以左右生死，珍貴的子彈請優先花在醫療兵 Medics、潛伏者 Cloakers、電擊兵 Tasers 及重裝兵 Bulldozers 等特殊敵人身上。

orig_text: Cloakers are immune to ECM feedback.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the fire extinguisher
Save file corrupt. Unable to save game.
tran_text: 存檔損毀，不能儲存遊戲。

orig_text: Find out which part of the museum where you will find the Diamond.
tran_text: 在博物館裡尋找保存鑽石的位置。

orig_text: Find and disable the anti-air system
tran_text: 尋找並關上反空安全系統

orig_text: Carry the paintings and throw them into the van
tran_text: 帶走畫作並將它們丟進車子裡

orig_text: Keep the safes protected while Bain looks for a way out and a transport vehicle
tran_text: 在 Bain 找到辦法前保護保險箱

orig_text: If you're the last one standing - staying alive has much more importance than the objective.
tran_text: 如果你是在場唯一生還者－－保命比完成任務更為重要。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to copy data from the USB stick
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 從隨身碟複製數據

orig_text: Use the refueling equipment to refuel the helicopter.
tran_text: 使用設備給直升機加油。

orig_text: Find your way into his house, and get into the server room
tran_text: 尋找方法進入他的房間,然後進入伺服器房

orig_text: Use the keyboard to reactivate the computer and continue the hacking
tran_text: 用鍵盤重啟電腦以繼續駭入

orig_text: The only thing in your way now is the back door of the train. Blow it up using your C4!
tran_text: 你的路上只剩下火車後門了，用你的 C4 烤開它！

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to help the turtle get back up
Alex dropped off the C4 bag, find it.
tran_text: Bile 投下了 C4 包，找到它。

orig_text: Search the area for more loot and throw it into the van or take the bike and leave!
tran_text: 搜索附近以尋找更多贓物及拋到貨車內，或拿到摩托車撤離！

orig_text: Wait until the server is exposed before you hit them! That server is the only way to make our transaction!
tran_text: 等待他拿出伺服器才打他！只有那伺服器才能令我們交易成功！

orig_text: Defend the Operations Room while Hoxton searches through the FBI intelligence servers.
tran_text: 在 Hoxton 從伺服器中尋找資料時，防守中央控制室。.

orig_text: The mercs don't want you to scan those test subjects. Keep them off it!
tran_text: 傭兵不想你去掃瞄實驗目標。趕走他們！

orig_text: The shoes are in the storage area behind a locked gate! Get it opened and search through the crates.
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a weapon and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現到武器並通報警察

orig_text: You don't have a throwable equipped.
Grab as many valuables from the vault that you can.
tran_text: 在金庫中盡量拿走所有值錢物品。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以激活掃瞄器

orig_text: Find the laptops that each contain a part of the vault door code.
tran_text: 尋找筆記本電腦以得到金庫門密碼。

orig_text: Wait for the timelock to open the security gate.
Destroying cameras reduces the police's intel on you.
tran_text: 破壞監視器會讓警察不知道你們的資料。

orig_text: Give the guest the spiked drink
Hack an FBI computer for the code
tran_text: 駭入 FBI 電腦找出避難室密碼

orig_text: You need the elevator maintenance key
The wine we're after is in one of the red gift boxes in the store. Open them and find the wine!
tran_text: 我們要找的紅酒就在商店內的紅色禮物盒內，打開它們並找到紅酒！

orig_text: Keep the cops from stopping the drill.

tran_text: 從經理身上拿到鑰匙卡

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to ignite the thermite paste

tran_text: 取得已被加密的隨身碟

orig_text: Aldstone doesn't like Hoxton's choice of profession, but as a loyal and professional butler he stoically accepts it.
tran_text: Aldstone 並不喜歡 Hoxton 少爺的職業，但作為一名忠心且專業的管家，他選擇默默接受。

orig_text: Subdue Ralph and get the keycard from him.
tran_text: 制伏 Ralph 及拿到鑰匙卡。

orig_text: Captain Winters holds a personal grudge against the Payday Gang.
tran_text: Captain Winters 與 Payday 幫有私怨。

orig_text: Remove the police stingers from the truck's path.
tran_text: 移除撤離車路徑上的警用釘刺。

orig_text: Saws use ammo quickly. Bring Ammo Bags to increase their usage.
tran_text: 電鋸消耗彈藥量是出奇地快，請常備彈藥包來增加使用次數。

orig_text: Grab the VR headset for Vlad!
tran_text: 為了 Vlad 拿走 VR 頭戴裝置！

orig_text: Secure Vlad's packages under the tree
tran_text: 在樹下獲得 Vlad 的包裹

orig_text: Rust would probably kill anyone who damaged his bike.
tran_text: Rust 會殺掉任何一個損壞他的重機的傢伙。

orig_text: Wait for the hack to finish
The Engineer Skill Subtree is primarily focused around the use of Sentry Guns.
tran_text: 技師技能樹的工程師分枝集中於提升哨戒炮台的效率。

orig_text: Force open the elevator doors so we can access the elevator shaft.
tran_text: 強行打開電梯門以到達電梯井

orig_text: Give him a whack over the head and tie him to the chair!
tran_text: 給他的頭一記重擊及綁他在椅子上！
你需要一個加料的瓶子！

orig_text: Got the Key to the Panic Room!
tran_text: 得到進入避難室的鑰匙！

orig_text: Find one of the sewer entrances in the town. Climb down, and fight to the exit.
tran_text: 找到城裡下水道入口。爬下去，殺到出口。

orig_text: There is some evidence related to the traitor that isn't present on the servers. Locate the Forensics Department.
tran_text: 有一些關於叛徒的證據不在伺服器裡。找出鑑識科。

orig_text: The Medics can heal other enemies - so take them out before they get the chance to.
tran_text: 醫療兵 Medics 會救治你擊殺的敵人－－在此之前及早殺掉他們吧。

orig_text: Find the server room - it's on the second floor. Unlock the door using the keycard.
tran_text: 使用鑰匙卡開啟二樓的伺服室

orig_text: Take the saw from inside the warehouse, you'll need it to open the storage units!
tran_text: 取出貨倉內的電鋸，你需要它們去打開儲存倉！

orig_text: Mount the drill on the gate outside the vault area.
Keep an eye on the drill - it jams.
tran_text: 密切關注鋁熱鑽的狀態

orig_text: Take the bomb parts to the helicopter
tran_text: 將炸彈部件運到直升機
幫 Vlad 找到 tiara 皇冠

orig_text: Bile is on his way with the C4. Hold tight.
tran_text: Bile 帶住 C4 來了，支持住。

orig_text: You need a keycard to enter the hotel room
tran_text: 你需要一張鑰匙卡來進入客房

orig_text: The car is inside the truck you came with.
tran_text: 轎車在你開來的卡車裡.

orig_text: Find your way to the tiara and steal it for Vlad
tran_text: 想辦法找到皇冠並幫 Vlad 偷走它
觸發警報：攝影機偵測到槍聲

orig_text: Scarface is proud of his Cuban origins even though he often professes his dislike of the island.
tran_text: Scarface 以身為古巴人而自豪，儘管他常常埋怨那個小小的島國。

orig_text: Gather everyone into the closet and change back into your civilian clothes.
tran_text: 全部人都進去儲物間換回正常的衣服

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a hacked computer and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現被駭客入侵的電腦並通報警察

orig_text: Drill your way into the vault.
Find and start hacking the security system

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Duke 對話

orig_text: Twitch is waiting for you with a truck. Drive into it to escape.
tran_text: 圖奇在卡車裡等你. 坐上去撤離.

orig_text: Some doors can be shot open by firing at their locks.
tran_text: 有一些門可以用槍射壞門鎖來打開它。

orig_text: The panic room should be in a flat on the third floor.

The mechanic requires you to collect a chrome skull from a storage room inside the clubhouse. You're gonna need a blowtorch from the mechanic. Get inside the storage room, grab it and deliver it to him!
tran_text: 機械師需要你在俱樂部的儲藏室內拿到一個鉻頭顱。你需要一把從機械師中得到的噴燈。進入儲藏室，拿到它，給他！

orig_text: Defend the tank and pump. Don't let swats interrupt either one.
tran_text: 保護好儲油桶跟幫浦。別讓警察中斷了。

orig_text: Enter the manager's office using his keycard. See if there's anything in there that can lead us into opening the storage.
tran_text: 用鑰匙卡進入經理辦公室，看看是否有引導我們打開儲存間的線索。

orig_text: Take down the snipers so that Charon can move to your location.
tran_text: 幹掉狙擊手讓 Charon 可以去你那面。

orig_text: The van is tangled in some wires, get it down.
tran_text: 貨車被一些電線纏住了，把它弄下來。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the Hard Drive
Bain has sent a plane to drop off the necessary ingredients
tran_text: Bain 派了架飛機投擲必要的原料

orig_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
tran_text: 鎖定降落在城裡某處的載錢貨盤。檢查樓頂和建築內。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian heard gunfire and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民聽見槍聲並通報警察

orig_text: Take the cutter from the floor to continue!
tran_text: 撿起地板的切割器並繼續！

orig_text: Start the winch motor to pull open the vault door.
tran_text: 啟動鉤繩的馬達開始拉開金庫門。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以放置液態氮

orig_text: Locate the missing server in the IT Department. It should be in one of the offices.
tran_text: 從資訊科找出遺失的伺服器。它應該在其中一個辦公室中。

orig_text: Profiles allow you to save your Loadout in order for you to quickly adjust your gear to the situation when being in the Loadout screen.
tran_text: 你可以將武器和裝備組合儲存於「裝備組」欄位中，以便在「裝備畫面」中快速切換裝備來應付當前任務的需要。

orig_text: The BFD is drilling into the vault. Wait for her, and keep the cops away.
tran_text: 鑽機老母正在鑽入金庫。等待她，並讓條子滾遠點。

orig_text: Chains often acts and talks like he's impervious to bullets. Perhaps he is.
tran_text: Chains 常常自誇自己刀槍不入，就不定他真的是。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Vlad 對話

orig_text: Pump the sleeping gas into ventilation
tran_text: 將催淚瓦斯送入通風管

orig_text: Sokol enjoys the fact that he still has fans in Russia from his ice hockey days.
tran_text: Sokol 對於他以前的冰球粉絲至今還記得他一事感到高興。

orig_text: Access the FBI communication relay on the telephone pole.
tran_text: 藉由電線桿使用 FBI 通訊中繼器。

orig_text: Jiro has picked up decent English after spending a couple of years in the US.
tran_text: Jiro 已經來到美國好幾年，他的英語尚算流利。

orig_text: Attach a bag of loot to the zipline in the elevator shaft. Locke will keep it safe.
tran_text: 把包掛在電梯井裡的滑索上。Locke會保證它安全。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to search for the files
Looks like something messed up with the BFD. Take the tools and repair her.
tran_text: 看起來某人搞壞了鑽機老母。拿上工具修理她。

orig_text: Captain Winters is not a kind leader.
tran_text: Captain Winters 不是個好上司。

orig_text: Open the vault and go inside
Try to hold off the cops.

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 打開通風管道

orig_text: We must re-wire the security system to start the time lock.
tran_text: 我們必須重接安全系統來啟動時間鎖

orig_text: Use the saw to cut the door open.
Carry the loot to the helicopter
Use the hacked computer to lower the bollards, and allow the truck to continue.
tran_text: 使用已駭取的電腦降下護柱，讓撤離車繼續前進。

orig_text: Find and inspect the vault up-close.
tran_text: 找到並近距離觀察金庫。

orig_text: Wait for Bile to arrive with the winch parts.
tran_text: 等待 Bile 帶來絞盤部件。

orig_text: Apply C4 to the wall next to the server room and blow a hole into the neighboring building.
tran_text: 在伺服室隔壁放置 C4 炸藥

orig_text: Cops are more easily intimidated if they are by themselves.
tran_text: 落單的警察會較易受到恐嚇。
拿起 VR 頭戴裝置中

orig_text: Jimmy has declared that he will empty the Safe House bar faster than Aldstone can refill it. It's a titanic struggle with an unclear outcome.
tran_text: Jimmy 發誓要以 Aldstone 來不及補充的速度把安全屋酒吧裡的酒喝清光，這場世紀之戰至今仍未分出勝負。

orig_text: We're headed down to the Teuer showroom. They got a few new Falcogini's in.
tran_text: 我們的目標是前往 Teuer 的汽車展示廠，他們有幾輛新的 Falcogini 。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to place the money clips
Meet with the gansters in the alley
tran_text: 在巷子與幫派份子會面

orig_text: Get the explosives in the dumpster and breach the door.
tran_text: 在垃圾桶裡拿到炸藥破開門。

orig_text: You have survived the challenge, now claim your prize!
tran_text: 你在挑戰中成功生存，拿你的獎品吧！
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以搜索展示櫃

orig_text: Place the C4 on the marked locations in the underground garage.
tran_text: 把 C4 安裝在地下室標記的地點上.

orig_text: Connect the heavy cable to the pick-up and the hatch, then start it up.
tran_text: 用繩索連接汽車和艙門，並啟動引擎。

orig_text: Mark the road with signal flares
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up recording device
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拾起錄音裝置

orig_text: Use $BTN_INTERACT; to shout at civilians and keep them in check.
tran_text: 使用 $BTN_INTERACT; 以喊叫市民以令他們恐懼。

orig_text: Use the override switches to force the main server open.
tran_text: 使用過載開關以強行打開主伺服器。

orig_text: Light the firework fuse and stand back!
Move the SWAT van from the truck's path.
tran_text: 把特種部隊裝甲車從逃脫車的路徑上移開。

orig_text: Gather around the Christmas tree and escape!
tran_text: 在聖誕樹附近會合然後撤離！

orig_text: Get past the outer fence of the FBI safe house. Look for a weakness in the fence or open one of the gates.
tran_text: 穿過 FBI 安全屋外面的圍籬。找尋圍籬的弱點或打開其中一個大門。

orig_text: Jump into the train and escape.
Defend the cooks and cook the meth
Find the last number for the armory code
tran_text: 找到軍械庫密碼最後一位

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a drill and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現鑽頭並通報警察

orig_text: Identification step 2/3: Use the security consoles to grant access to the vault.
tran_text: 鑑定階段 2/3 ：使用保安控制板以獲准進入金庫

orig_text: Pick up the bags containing the drill parts and bring them to the vault.
tran_text: 拿起裝有鑽機部件的包並運到金庫

orig_text: They got a sniper in one of the apartments over the courtyard.
tran_text: 他們在庭院對出的建築內有狙擊手。

orig_text: You will need new equipment in order to breach the final train door.
tran_text: 你將需要新的工具以突破最終的火車門。

orig_text: Wait for the C4 drop on the roof
tran_text: 等待 C4 投放到天台

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to activate the barcode reader
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來啟動條碼掃描機

orig_text: Secure the cloaker loot in a vent nearby.
tran_text: 將 cloaker 的贓物放進附近的通風口。

orig_text: Go through with the drug deal. This is the front that allows us to enter the building.
tran_text: 進入以進行毒品交易，這是讓我們進入建築的藉口。

orig_text: The helicopter is filling the wagon with water. It's gonna take a couple of minutes until the elicopter empties its water container.
tran_text: 直升機正在將水灌入車廂。清空直升機的水箱需要數分鐘。

orig_text: Jimmy is crazy. Really crazy. He offers a few jobs against Akan and his army of Russian mercenaries.
tran_text: Jimmy 是個瘋子，瘋到骨子裡去了。他有幾個委託，都是針對 Akan 與他的俄國傭兵。

orig_text: Look for the fireworks in the storage room and take them.
tran_text: 在儲藏室尋找並拿走煙火。

orig_text: Pick up the bags containing the drill parts
tran_text: 拿起裝有鑽機部件的包

orig_text: Make sure the computer is processing. See to it that the cops do not cut the power, if they do you have to turn it back on fast to keep the computers running.
tran_text: 確保電腦持續進行。留意別被警察切掉電源，如果被切掉了你要竟快把它重新打開讓電腦能持續進行

orig_text: We need to get through that gate, the BCI is on the other side.
tran_text: 我們需要穿過閘門，爾灣暴走族俱樂部的人在另一面。

orig_text: Take the engine to the helicopter
Get through the door and into the back office!
tran_text: 穿過門以進入後面的辦公室！

orig_text: Use the flare on the run way to call down the helicopter
tran_text: 使用信號彈呼叫直升機

orig_text: Find Chavez and get his key
They should have the BCI in the front of the train. Make your way there!
tran_text: 這裡應該有爾灣暴走族俱樂部的人在火車前面。去那裡！

orig_text: Throw the packages underneath the tree to secure them!
tran_text: 拋那包裹到樹下以獲得它們！

orig_text: Stockholm Syndrome: Unable to use in stealth
tran_text: 斯德哥爾摩症候群：潛行時不可用

orig_text: Use the C4 to blow a hole in the weakened floor!
tran_text: 使用 C4 炸開地板較脆弱地方！

orig_text: Find the circuit breaker to turn the power back on and continue the hacking.
tran_text: 找出變電箱打開電源以繼續駭入。

orig_text: Open the door to the alley.
Body Bags can be thrown into deep water or into dumpsters in order to safely hide them.
tran_text: 想安全處理屍袋，你可以將扔進大海或是大型垃圾箱裡。

orig_text: Shotgun AP Rounds will pierce through both Shields and cops armor.
tran_text: 霰彈槍的穿甲彈可以擊穿警察的盾牌和護甲。

orig_text: Locate and get into the hidden vault
Maximum number of following hostages reached.
tran_text: 已達到令平民移動的最高上限。

orig_text: Hold the fort until the thermite has burned through the vault.
tran_text: 在鋁熱劑燒穿金庫前守住

orig_text: Wait for the time lock to finish

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 遠端遙控電腦

orig_text: Wait for the mechanic to complete assembling the bike part you collected for him. He will tell you what to do next.
tran_text: 等待機械師完成組裝你給他的摩托車部件。他會告訴你下一步如何做的。

orig_text: Carry the thermal drill to the vault
Alarm tripped: Police was affected by ECM feedback
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察受到干擾器反饋的影響

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pry open elevator door
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以撬開電梯門

orig_text: Hector's jobs are mostly about violence. Dress for a fight, and bring a big gun.
tran_text: Hector 的委託都是與暴力相關的。穿厚一點，全副武裝上陣就準沒錯。

orig_text: The cutter has stopped. Restart it!
tran_text: 切割器停下來了。重新啟動它！

orig_text: Protect the flare. Cops will attempt to extinguish it.
tran_text: 守護信號彈。條仔們會試圖熄滅它。

orig_text: The van is on its way!
Locke has supplied vital equipment in three crates. The crates are marked with a strobe light.
tran_text: Locke 提供了必要裝備在三個板條箱裡。板條箱被紅燈標記。

orig_text: Getting kicked by a Cloaker or tased by Taser does not count towards your total amount times you are allowed to go down.
tran_text: 被潛伏者 Cloaker 踢倒，或是被電擊兵 Taser 電倒，都不會扣除倒地次數。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 放置聚能炸藥

orig_text: Find where the Diamond is kept
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to plug in the power
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pour the spiked drink
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 倒入已加料的飲料

orig_text: It's often faster to swap to your fully loaded Secondary weapon then attempt to reload your Primary weapon.
tran_text: 主武器子彈噴光了的話，切換成副武器的速度會比更換主武器彈匣更快。

orig_text: Move the goats to the truck
Load the coke onto the boat
Pour out the thermite to melt the floor
Get into the local security station and approve the door opening sequence.
tran_text: 進入本地安保系統確認門的啟動程序

orig_text: Bile needs to wait for the smoke to clear, you need to keep the police off the roof until then.
tran_text: Bile 需要等待煙霧散走，你要趕走警察直到直昇機離開。

orig_text: When your armor is low, take cover, it will regenerate over a short time and you will stay alive longer.
tran_text: 當你護甲值變低時，請立即躲起來，護甲值會在短時間內恢復，令你活得久一點。
找出 Moretta 的聯絡頻率
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來啟動灑水器

orig_text: Find and access the Archives. Search the documents for the blueprint plans of the casino.
tran_text: 找到並進入檔​​案館。搜索文件尋找賭場的建築藍圖。

orig_text: They triggered the alarm which locked down the vault, find the CFO so that we can see if we can find out how to override the lockdown.
tran_text: 他們激活了警報令金庫被鎖起了，找到總裁看看能不能找到方法超載那鎖。

orig_text: Almost every Stealth heist has a Camera Operator, be sure to kill him so cameras are no longer a problem.
tran_text: 大多數的可潛行任務的場地都設有一名負責觀看監視鏡頭的人員，解決了他就等同解決了所有監視鏡頭。

orig_text: Escort the pilot to the helicopter
Throw the part you've found into the mechanic's truck!
tran_text: 拋你找到的部件到機械師的卡車內！

orig_text: Hector wants you to record when you burn the money
tran_text: Hector想要你錄下你燒錢的影像

orig_text: Gather the equipment from the marked crates.
tran_text: 從被標記的板條箱裡拿上裝備。

orig_text: Go up to the tap and make sure the water is flowing.
tran_text: 開動水龍頭並確保水一直流動。

orig_text: You need to open the house up. Find the switch that controls the doors and windows.
tran_text: 你需要打開這屋子，找到開關以控制門窗。

orig_text: Escort Charon to the Escape location
tran_text: 護送 Charon 到撤離點

orig_text: Place the thermite on the vault
Find your way up to the end of the overpass - Bile will pick you up with the helicopter. Make sure you have Matt with you!
tran_text: 去立交橋的尾部 － Alex 會在那裡用直昇機接你，確保你帶住 Matt ！

orig_text: Wait for the drill to finish.
Make the escape, a helicopter will pick you up on the neighbouring rooftop.
tran_text: 撤離，直昇機會在相鄰的天台帶你離開。

orig_text: Use the computer to give Bain access to their network
tran_text: 用電腦讓 Bain 駭入他們的網路

orig_text: Escort the CFO to the roof so that Bain can pick him up and extort him.
tran_text: 護送總裁到天台讓 Bain 抓走他來勒索他。

orig_text: There's some old information that isn't stored in the digital system. Access the Archives to retrieve them.
tran_text: 有一些舊檔案沒在電腦上建檔。到資料室取回它們。

orig_text: Pour the spiked drink for the guest. Don't be stingy. This is Vegas, where everyone has a good time, so fill that glass up.
tran_text: 為客人添滿加料的飲料。別吝嗇。這裡是賭城，所有人都在享受好時光，所以把杯子倒滿。

orig_text: Jimmy once challenged Bonnie to a drinking competition, but they had to interrupt after it nearly ended in violence.
tran_text: Jimmy 曾經跟 Bonnie 鬥過一次酒，但後來幾乎是暴力收場所以無疾而終。

orig_text: The drill has stopped. Restart it!
tran_text: 鑽機停下來了。重新啟動它！

orig_text: Wait for Bain to finish the negotiations.
tran_text: 等待 Bain 完成談判。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Jimmy 對話

orig_text: Use the zip-line to get to the crane
Alarm tripped: Police detected a broken camera
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到被破壞的攝影機

orig_text: Shotguns can take down multiple cops in a single shot. Aim for a crowd and fire away.
tran_text: 霰彈槍一發就能幹掉好幾個警察。找一大群人瞄準，呯下去吧。

orig_text: Skill points can be reallocated with no cost. Experiment and test for yourself.
tran_text: 你隨時都能重新配置技能點數，而且不另收費。不妨嘗試更多的組合看看。

orig_text: Open up the Gensec truck and steal the cash
Retrieve the information from the gangsters

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 讓起重機升起

orig_text: Lasers will not damage you - but they will trigger the alarm.
tran_text: 保安雷射線不會將你切成兩半－－但它們會引發警報。

orig_text: Figure out which staff computer it is and access it locally. Worst case scenario you can always hack them all.
tran_text: 找出哪一個員工電腦是正確的，並到那裡駭入電腦。最糟的情況是你要駭入所有的電腦。

orig_text: Find a way to get into the FBI office building
tran_text: 用電腦給 Bain 他們網路的權限
護送 Hoxton 到逃脫車上。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to set up the zip-line
Sydney's hair is not natural blue.
tran_text: Sydney 的一頭藍髮不是天生的。

orig_text: Remove the gangplanks and stop enemies from getting on the boat. We can't leave until the boat is empty of swats.
tran_text: 移除跳版並阻止敵人上到船上，我們是不能帶住警察離開的。

orig_text: The van will circle the block, and come back into parking lot, so be ready
tran_text: 廂型車會先繞入引開條子注意再回來，所以你們最好提高警覺

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a trip mine and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民注意到詭雷並通報警察

orig_text: Find the bank manager and get his keycard
tran_text: 找到銀行經理，並且拿到鑰匙卡。

orig_text: Either choose to escape or decide to stay and upload the second database which will increase your chances of intercepting the right truck later.
tran_text: 要嘛就逃，要嘛就留下來上傳可以增加成功攔截正確卡車機會的資料庫。

orig_text: Rotate the crane so it is above the skylights
tran_text: 旋轉起重機讓它在天窗之上

orig_text: Make sure that the loot is secured
Hose is connected. Now start the pump to get the process started.
tran_text: 油管連接完畢。現在把幫浦啟動開始加油吧。

orig_text: Clover spends a fortune on electronics.
Bring the encryption keys to Hoxton so that he can continue searching through the FBI intelligence servers.
tran_text: 把解密金鑰拿給 Hoxton 才能繼續搜索 FBI 情報伺服器。

orig_text: The mechanic waits for you to grab his equipment!
tran_text: 機械師等待你去拿他的裝備！

orig_text: Move up the Hill with Matt
tran_text: 逼 Matt 走上山 ( 阿米蒂奇大道 )

orig_text: Houston likes to keep an eye on the escape van, making sure it's in good shape.
tran_text: Houston 一直有好好保養逃亡車，確保她在最佳狀態。

orig_text: Get rid of all the law enforcers on the roof.
tran_text: 解決天台上的執法人員。

orig_text: Know your enemy. The Snipers give away their position by their laser sights.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。敵方狙擊手會親切地透過狙擊槍的雷射光束來暴露他們的位置。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 安置爆破炸藥
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來移除裝甲側裙

orig_text: Attach the cars to the magnet
Bile has dropped the pieces for the winch. Go and grab them.
tran_text: Bile 扔下了絞盤部件。去拿起它們。

orig_text: Find the guest inside the Gambling Hall
Hold out until Bain finds an escape
tran_text: 等待直到 Bain 找到撤離位置

orig_text: Scan more or grab the server
tran_text: 掃瞄更多或帶走伺服器

orig_text: Leave the area with your car.
tran_text: 用你的車離開這片區域.

orig_text: Get hand confirmation from the lead scientist
tran_text: 取得科學家首領的手掌認證

orig_text: There should be a scanner that we can use to scan the test subjects somewhere, find it
tran_text: 這裡應該有一個掃瞄器用以掃瞄實驗目標，找到它。

orig_text: Set this hostage free to release your teammate from custody!
tran_text: 放走這個人質來交換你的隊友！

orig_text: The saw has finished. Remove it!
Find three numbers for the vault code
Almost all drills have a chance to break on their own. Be sure to keep a close eye on them.
tran_text: 幾乎所有該死的電鑽都會有機會故障。雖然這很該死但也請隨時看緊它們。

orig_text: Dragan spends a lot of time keeping himself in physical shape.
tran_text: Dragan 花上大量時間去維持自己的體能。

orig_text: Shield units can block bullets, try to work together to flank them or use armor piercing bullets.
tran_text: 盾牌兵的防暴護盾可以擋下大部分的子彈，與隊友合作去包抄他們，或是使用穿甲子彈。

orig_text: You cant exit here, all doors are blocked
tran_text: 你不能離開這裡，所有的門都被上鎖。

orig_text: Open the marked storage units and find the diamonds!
tran_text: 打開儲存倉並找出鑽石！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a body bag
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到了屍袋

orig_text: The escape is now available. The boat is waiting for you. You can leave or stay for more loot.
tran_text: 現在可以撤離了，船在等著你。你可以撤離或留下來搜刮更多的贓物。

orig_text: Destroy 8 bags of weapons stashed inside the gangster hideout
tran_text: 摧毀8包堆在幫派藏身點的武器

orig_text: Escape, or pick up more loot
Gage doesn't like everything about his job, but he does have a passion for the merchandise.
tran_text: Gage 並不是那麼喜歡他的工作，但是他很熱愛他的商品。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Sydney 對話

orig_text: Look for clues as to which engine is the working one and bag it up
tran_text: 找尋關於正確引擎的線索並打包引擎

orig_text: Different Perk Decks have different effects and attributes. Try them all to see which Perk Deck suits you the best.
tran_text: 各種牌組都有不同的特性和效果，不妨多試幾個牌組來找出最貼合自己需要的。

orig_text: Find two more numbers for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 再找兩個軍械庫的通行密碼。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to use a shaped charge
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來使用成型炸藥

orig_text: Do you find it hard to find ammo boxes when you are out of ammo? You can turn on outlines for ammo, arrows and Throwables in the settings menu.
tran_text: 覺得子彈盒很難發現所以常常沒子彈？不妨在遊戲設定中開啟將子彈盒、箭矢和投擲品高亮標示的選項。

orig_text: Enter the three numbers into the vault security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.
tran_text: 輸入三組數字到金庫保安系統中。記得按正確順序來。

orig_text: Trade the meth for the information
Put thermite on the vault to melt the door hinges.
tran_text: 利用鋁熱劑溶解金庫門栓。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Security operator detected a broken camera
tran_text: 觸發警報：保安發現了被破壞的攝影機

orig_text: $HELPER; traded a hostage and got you out of custody!
tran_text: $HELPER; 交易了人質以解救你脫離拘留！

orig_text: For as long as Captain Winters is present, the police will not stop the assault.
tran_text: 只要 Captain Winters 尚在現場，警察的攻堅就永不停歇。

orig_text: Hold the fort until the helicopter returns to lift the panic room.
tran_text: 守住直到直昇機回來帶走安全室。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected an open vault
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到被開啟的金庫

orig_text: Wait for the ship to move to Loading Dock 3B.
Kill the mobsters in the management office.
tran_text: 殺死在管理辦公室內的匪徒。

orig_text: Set fire to the money pile and watch it burn
Doctor Bags will give three lives back, if you only been downed once it's better to use a First Aid Kit.
tran_text: 使用醫療包即會回復三次倒地次數，如果你只是倒地一兩次的話請改用急救包。

orig_text: Take the paintings to the van
A skilled Mastermind can convert cops to your side by first taking them hostage.
tran_text: 專業的黑手可以說服已成為人質的警察變節來為你們賣命。

orig_text: Get through the lobby and make your way to the hallway outside the server room.
tran_text: 穿越大廳並且找路通達伺服室外的走廊

orig_text: Look for clues around the docks and in the warehouses, find out which one of the trucks is shipping the voting machines to Washington and then tag it with your GPS.
tran_text: 在港口和倉庫找尋線索，找出哪一台卡車裝有運到華盛頓的投票機器，並用你的全球定位裝置標註它。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a sentry gun
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到自動砲台

orig_text: Killing a guard in a cam room will let you freely roam without worrying about the cameras - but roaming guards still can detect you.
tran_text: 監視房內的警衛一死，你就可以自由行動而不用再擔心監視鏡頭－－但不包括其他警衛。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Bodhi 對話

orig_text: Find the rats and kill them
In order for a plane to land on the road, you need to cut the remaining trees down.
tran_text: 為了讓飛機降落，你需要砍倒剩下的樹。

orig_text: Conceal your identity. Keep your mask on.
tran_text: 隱藏你的身份，戴上面具。

orig_text: Get the server, plug it in
tran_text: 拿到伺服器並插入電源

orig_text: You can select up to four preferred heisters, in case one of them is already taken by another player.
tran_text: 你可以從 Payday 幫的成員當中設定最多四名為你的最愛，以便萬一該成員被隊友先選了，你也不用被逼扮演不討喜的傢伙。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn crane to the right
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 讓起重機往右轉

orig_text: Enter the correct code and open the vault.
tran_text: 輸入正確的密碼以打開金庫。

orig_text: Wait for thermite paste to burn through
Get into the house and locate the meth lab.
tran_text: 進入房子並找到製毒實驗室。

orig_text: The mechanic needs a special part from a bike located inside the garage. Open the garage to make way for our friendly mechanic. Escort and guard him to the objective. Once he got his parts, get back to the truck with him.
tran_text: 機械師需要在停車場中的摩托車拿到特別部件。打開停車場去讓我們友善的機械師進入。護送及保護他到該物品。當他得到那部份，送他回卡車。

orig_text: Find the last number for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 找到最後一位金庫通行密碼。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: Double the fun. Use Akimbo weapons to wield two pistols or SMGs.
tran_text: 火力增量，樂趣加倍。不妨使用雙持類武器，拿著一對手槍或衝鋒槍出去威風一下。

orig_text: Bodhi is into crazy stunts like extreme skydiving.
tran_text: Bodhi 喜歡瘋狂的特技，例如極限跳傘。

orig_text: Have you tried answering the phone?
tran_text: 你是真的打算讓我直接幫你接？！

orig_text: Locate and enter the server room
Go back to the van and pick up C4. Place it on the street outside to prepare the escape.
tran_text: 回到廂型車取得 C4 。將它裝在對面的街上以準備逃脫。
發訊號給 Blonde 先生

orig_text: Clear obstacles in the landing area
Search through the mall for a shopping bag containing the tin toy. They should be scattered around the stores.
tran_text: 在廣場中搜索有錫玩具的購物袋，它們應該在商店附近。

orig_text: The blimp is lowering the drill. Wait for it.
tran_text: 飛艇正在卸下鑽機中。稍候。

orig_text: Burn the cars in the parking lot using gasoline. Shoot the gas can once placed.
tran_text: 用汽油讓車子燃燒。放好汽油桶後射它。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以倒入液態氮

orig_text: Go and get spare parts to repair the Beast
tran_text: 得到備用零件來修復「野獸」

orig_text: There's a chainsaw somewhere around, find it!
Get to the escape vehicle and get out of there!
tran_text: 進入撤離車輛並離開這裡！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: GenSec called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報： GenSec 人員報警

orig_text: Cover Charon while he lockpicks the gate.
tran_text: 當 Charon 在打鎖時保護他。
有個 Taser 正在電你！

orig_text: The Gunslinger Skill Subtree specializes in Pistols.
tran_text: 逃犯技能樹的西部槍客分枝專精於手槍相關技能。

orig_text: You've cleared the place out, it's time to get out of here.
tran_text: 你帶走了所有東西了，是時候離開了。

orig_text: Locke sold us out. The deal was a scam and swats are everywhere! Fight off the ambush!
tran_text: Locke 出賣了我們，這交易是假的，到處都是條子！殺出一條血路！

orig_text: Continue using the control panel to unlock vaults and find loot.
tran_text: 繼續使用控制面板解鎖金庫然後尋找贓物。

orig_text: Defend the truck from the cops while it takes you away from the heat.
Use the keycards on the card readers to open up the vault.
tran_text: 用鑰匙卡插在讀卡機上來打開金庫

orig_text: Smash up and bag the meth
Answer the pager to keep them from sounding the alarm.
tran_text: 回答無線電以避免警鈴響起。

orig_text: Get down under the pool and into the printing shelter.
tran_text: 進入水池下的影印庇護所。
按下 $BTN_interact; 以插入鎖匙卡

orig_text: Light a flare to signal Bile for the escape.
tran_text: 燃點信號彈以通知 Bile 撤離。

orig_text: Cameras can't detect noise, but they'll still sound the alarm if they see suspicious activity for too long.
tran_text: 監視鏡頭沒有感應聲響的功能，但它們發現可疑活動夠久的話就會發出警報。

orig_text: Get on the ship and start opening the containers.
tran_text: 登上船隻，開始打開貨櫃。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以移除螺絲釘

orig_text: Get to the pick-up truck and keep the cops away from the coke
tran_text: 去接應卡車並確保警察遠離古柯鹼

orig_text: The Commissar will call Bain through a hotline. This way Bain can track his position to find out where exactly he is hiding at.
tran_text: 政委會透過熱線與 Bain 聯絡。這樣 Bain 可以追蹤他的確切藏身所。

orig_text: The captain is being held behind a locked garage door. Saw it open and free him.
tran_text: 船長被藏在鐵門後，鋸開門以救出他。

orig_text: Bring the case file to Hoxton
If you are gonna defend an area it might be a good idea to plant some equipment for your team.
tran_text: 當你們要死守一處地方時，在四周設置醫療包等裝備對隊伍有莫大助益。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 打電話給船長

orig_text: Don't forget to leave with the camera and the tapes
tran_text: 離開前別忘了帶走攝影機和帶子
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 打開聖誕節禮物

orig_text: Connect the server so that Hoxton can access it.
tran_text: 連接伺服器讓 Hoxton 可以讀取它。

orig_text: Disable the anti air system so that the plane can fly in and drop the EMP.
tran_text: 關上反空安全系統以容許飛機投下 EMP 。

orig_text: Go inside and inspect the vault.
Secure the loot at the drop off
tran_text: 將贓物運到指定的投包點

orig_text: Go to the control room and close the bridge.
Scarface spends a fortune on furniture and decorations.
tran_text: Scarface 在傢俱和裝飾方面出手闊綽。

orig_text: If your teammates has been taken into custody you need a hostage or a dominated cop to be able to trade and get your teammate back.
tran_text: 如果你的隊友不幸被拘捕，你需要準備人質或投降的警察，透過交換人質來換取隊友的自由。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來駭取筆記型電腦

orig_text: Breach the trainyard and locate the Murkywater Trains inside.
tran_text: 進入火車站再找到裡面黑水的火車。

orig_text: You need to take the hook from the winch first
tran_text: 你需要從絞盤上拿下掛鉤

orig_text: Bain is sending you a new escape vehicle that will arrive shortly
tran_text: Bain派了一輛新的撤離車輛給你，一會兒就會到

orig_text: Rewire the circuit boxes to disable the first security systems leading to the Diamond exhibit.
tran_text: 把電路箱重新接線來解除前往鑽石展覽室的第一道保全裝置。

orig_text: Keep the cops away from the vault!

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 強行破解時間鎖

orig_text: Stand back and enjoy the show!
tran_text: 退到安全距離來享受這場好戲！

orig_text: Find a path across the trap floor
tran_text: 找到通過地板陷阱的路

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the hard drive
Move downstairs, away from the C4!
We can use the truck for transporting the safes. Toss the safes in the back.
tran_text: 我們可以使用貨車運送保險箱，丟進車廂。

orig_text: DNA evidence related to Hoxton's case is somewhere in the Evidence Room. Search the shelves for the evidence.
tran_text: 與 Hoxton 有關的證據在證據室的某處。在櫃子找尋證據。

orig_text: Use the keycards you found to open the dock gate. Insert them into a panel located inside the dock control room close to the gate.
tran_text: 用你找到的鑰匙卡打開大門。在靠近大門的港口控制室將鑰匙卡插入控制板。

orig_text: Stockholm Syndrome: Press Jump to use
tran_text: 斯德哥爾摩症候群：按下跳以使用

orig_text: The cops have shut down the winch. Get it started again.
tran_text: 條子們關掉了絞盤。重啟它。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to arrive

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_STATS_VIEW; 以查看目標詳情。

orig_text: Use the computer in the server room to start uploading the files to the FBI
tran_text: 在伺服器房裡使用電腦開始上傳檔案到FBI

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the winch to the vault
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以連接鈎繩至金庫

orig_text: Plant the C4 in the Gambling Hall
Throw the bags to do the trade
The guest just lost the keycard. Collect it. You can use it to enter his room.
tran_text: 客人剛遺失了房卡。撿起它。你可以用來進入他的房間。

orig_text: The BFD will drill down through the Gambling Hall and into the vault. Start her up!
tran_text: 鑽機老母會鑽開賭場大廳進入金庫。啟動她！

orig_text: Hold fort and defend the helicopter while it lowers the magnet into the hole.
tran_text: 守住直到直昇機放下磁鐵到洞上。

orig_text: There is a zip-line just by the lake which you can use to get the loot on the boat.
tran_text: 湖旁邊有滑索，你可以用它將贓物運到船上。

orig_text: Jacket has never spoken a word to the other heisters without using his tape recorder.
tran_text: Jacket 從沒說過話，他都是用卡式錄音機跟其他劫匪溝通。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to Switch Trip Mine to Sensor Mode
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 更換詭雷的感應模式

orig_text: To reach the paintings, access the security room and hack the security system
tran_text: 為了拿到畫，進入保安室駭入保安系統

orig_text: Watch out for Cloakers - they attack when you least expect it. So beware of their sound.
tran_text: 小心 Cloakers 潛伏者－－他們會在你意想不到的地方展開攻擊。所以一聽到奇怪的噪音時請提高警覺。

orig_text: Fight through the apartments to catch the Commissar!
tran_text: 在公寓殺出重圍抓到政委！

orig_text: The EMP knocked out the test subjects, find them and get them to the scanner. They should be dressed in blue.
tran_text: EMP 弄掉了實驗目標，尋找並帶他們到掃瞄器。他們衣著應該是藍色的。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以剪除鐵絲網

orig_text: Check the name of the IT technician on the white board in the manager's office. Then locate the IT technician's desk and hack their computer.
tran_text: 在經理的辦公室裡，檢查白板上技術員的名子。然後找出並駭入技術員的電腦。

orig_text: Get inside Black Ridge and fight your way to the inner complex.
tran_text: 進入黑脊然後殺出你的路進入核心區域。

orig_text: You can now grab the loot for the Dentist. Look for a golden chest.
tran_text: 你現在可以拿上 Dentist 的贓物。尋找一個黃金匣子。
將絞盤連到鑽機老母上面

orig_text: Vlad's jobs will offer a mix of Stealth and Loud combat, be ready for anything.
tran_text: Vlad 的委託既有潛行的亦有火併的，所以請有心理準備會遇上任何突發狀況。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a trip mine
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到詭雷

orig_text: Hide the body somewhere to keep it out of sight.
tran_text: 隱藏屍體到沒人看到的地方。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a dead body and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現死屍並通報警察

orig_text: Connect the winch hook to the drill.
tran_text: 將絞盤的爪鉤連接到鑽機上。

orig_text: Some heists can be completed in Stealth without alerting the guards.
tran_text: 可潛行的劫案可以在不驚動任何一個守衛的情況下完成。

orig_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the vault. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 金庫有三位不同的通行密碼。你需要得到他們所有。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: Kill the sniper in the building across the street.
tran_text: 殺死在對面街的狙擊手。

orig_text: You can leave now or stay and get more loot, it is up to you.
tran_text: 你現在可以離開或者留下以拿到更多贓物，你決定吧。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to arrive at the museum.
tran_text: 等待直升機抵達博物館

orig_text: You can melee hit the hostage
tran_text: 你能用近戰使人質趴下

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to burn all your offshore money
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以燒掉所以海外資金

orig_text: Defend Santa's Workshop while the cops try and steal Christmas! We must meet Santa's quota for the year!
tran_text: 保護聖誕工坊阻止條子毀掉聖誕節！我們必須滿足聖誕老人一年的份！
製作更多毒品或直接撤離
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以射出曲棍球

orig_text: Search the nearby apartments for the information
tran_text: 在附近的公寓搜索情報

orig_text: We've got the bug from the yayo stash, now hook it up with the phone.
tran_text: 我們在古柯鹼堆中找到那裝置了，現在連它到手機上。

orig_text: No one likes prisons, but there's something that is different about this one. Time to find out what.
tran_text: 沒有人喜歡監獄，但這個有點分別，是時候去看看了。

orig_text: The gate leading to the vault area is locked with a secondary security check. Hack the marked computers to find the code for the keypad that is located by the gate.
tran_text: 要打開通往金庫區域的閘門需要通過二級安檢步驟。駭進我標識的桌上電腦去找出那道閘門的密瑪。

orig_text: Activate and protect the emp, it will take some time to charge
tran_text: 激活並保護 EMP ，它需要點時間才能突破。

orig_text: Carry the thermal drill to the vault
Use the code to open the panic room door.
tran_text: 用密碼打開避難室的門。

orig_text: Time to get what we came for; place some C4 and blow open that floor!
tran_text: 該完成我們來這裡的目的了;安裝C4把地板炸開！

orig_text: Kill the guard and hide the body
Open the Security Center door and get inside to open the skylight barrier.
tran_text: 打開安保中心的門進去然後打開天窗柵欄。

orig_text: The Director's approval is needed to access certain secure files. Locate his office and find a way of approving the files.
tran_text: 特定的資料需要局長的授權才能觀看，找到他的辦公室並想辦法取得授權。

orig_text: You will need hostages! Tie down civilians with $BTN_INTERACT; to take them hostage.
tran_text: 你會需要人質！按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 綁住市民使他們成為人質。

orig_text: You need a BFD tool to fix the BFD
tran_text: 你需要專用工具來修復鑽機老母
按住 $BTN INTERACT; 開動起重機

orig_text: The plane is waiting for you on the road.

ECM Jammers might stop guards from sounding the alarm, but in many cases they also stop certain map objectives from being completed while they're active and should therefore be treated as a last resort.
tran_text: ECM干擾器可以用來阻止保安人員報警，但干擾器也會令某些特定暫停運作，從而妨礙你達成任務。因此請將使用ECM干擾器視為最後手段。

orig_text: Investigate the storage room, it's supposed to have the car keys. Let's see what security they have.
tran_text: 找出儲藏間，那裡應該會有車鑰匙。來看看他們做了什麼保安措施。

orig_text: Get a gas can and put it on the tire pit. It will create a smoke screen.
tran_text: 拿起汽油倒進輪胎裡，那樣會產生一個煙幕。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take loot from the vehicle
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 從車輛拿走贓物

orig_text: You killed a civilian! Trade penalty: 10 seconds.
tran_text: 你殺死了一個市民！交易延遲：十秒。

orig_text: Guards may come over and investigate broken cameras - so don't shoot cameras if you can avoid it.
tran_text: 監視鏡頭被破壞的話，是會有警衛過來查看的－－所以沒必要的話請盡量避免打壞它們。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a broken window
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到玻璃被打碎

orig_text: Wait for the panic room to unlock

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來打開或關上保安系統箱

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Metal detector was activated
tran_text: 觸發警報： 金屬探測器偵測到槍枝

orig_text: You need blueprints to scan them!
You will need to restart the drill if it jams.
tran_text: 如果鑽機卡住了，你將須重新開啟它。

orig_text: Enter the place where the polls are held
Fire up the balloon at the cage you assembled.
tran_text: 在你組裝好的籠子上升起氣球.

orig_text: The game has several difficulty levels. Find one that fits you.
tran_text: 這遊戲有不同的難度可供選擇，請量力而為。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the circle cutter
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿走圓盤切割器
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Dallas 對話

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to access the FBI Files
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以存取 FBI 檔案

orig_text: You can't shoot your teammates with regular bullets. Unless you have the "Friendly Fire" Mutator turned on.
tran_text: 你手上的一般子彈是不會傷到同伴的，除非你已開啟了「友軍炮火」突變效果。

orig_text: Search for the Moretta's Comm Frequency on the computers.
tran_text: 用電腦搜尋 Moretta 的聯絡頻率

orig_text: Some enemies use body armor and you need to aim for their heads.
tran_text: 有些敵人也會穿上防彈護甲。要殺傷他們，請瞄準頭部。

orig_text: Find out which railcar contains the prototype turret and break into it.
tran_text: 找到有步哨塔原型的車廂並潛入車廂。

orig_text: Move around in the mall and destroy $50.000 worth of stuff
tran_text: 在商城裡造成至少$50，000的毀損

orig_text: You have no more body bags.

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 放置爆破裝置

orig_text: Get the server to the van
Secure your loot in the helicopter.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn crane to the left
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 讓起重機往左轉

orig_text: Get on the ship and start drilling the containers.
tran_text: 登上船隻，開始鑽開貨櫃。

orig_text: Secure more loot in the getaway van or escape!
tran_text: 將更多鑽石袋子送到逃亡車輛，或是立即逃亡。

orig_text: Find the last number for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 找到最後一位軍械庫通行密碼。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: Connect the winch to the BFD
tran_text: 連接線纜到鑽機老母上

orig_text: The loot is pouring from the prison, try and secure as much as you can before time runs out!
tran_text: 監獄中有贓物噴出來，試試在時間完前盡可以獲得贓物！

orig_text: Reach the Diamond but watch out for alarmed floor tiles. Use the path in the circuit box.
tran_text: 小心連上警報的地板瓦片並抵達鑽石。按照電路箱產生的路徑移動。

orig_text: Place the thermite over the vault.
tran_text: 將鋁熱劑放置在金庫上。

orig_text: Download the encryption keys from the Security Office servers so that Hoxton can access the encrypted FBI servers.
tran_text: 從保安辦公室的伺服器下載解密金鑰， Hoxton 才能用它取得加密的伺服器。

orig_text: A server is missing from the server room and is undergoing repairs in the IT department. Access the IT Department to retrieve it.
tran_text: 伺服器房少了一台伺服器，伺服器在資訊科進行維修。到資訊科把它取回來。

orig_text: Hide the body inside the dumpster.

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以打開購物袋

orig_text: The crane is putting the gold onto our truck. Hold your ground.
tran_text: 起重機正把黃金吊進我們的卡車，守好。
關閉金庫門的電力設備

orig_text: Find a way to open the security door
tran_text: 想辦法打開伺服器房的門

orig_text: You can't put away your guns and mask once you've masked up. Don't mask up until you're ready for action.
tran_text: 一旦戴上面具就不能再除下來，拔出的槍也不能收回去了。未準備好就別亂戴面具。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the fusion reactor prototype
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿走原型聚變反應堆

orig_text: The BFD needs a lot of coolant. Refill both water tanks
tran_text: 鑽機老母需要很多冷卻劑。重新灌滿水箱。

orig_text: The escape vehicle is on the way. Defend your position!
tran_text: 撤離車正在路上。堅守陣地！

orig_text: Explosion has scattered the wagons all around the forest. Move into the forest and look for the vault wagon, you will have to open the doors on each one of them until you find the one with the vault.
tran_text: 爆炸使得車廂散落在森林裡。到森林裡尋找有金庫的車廂，你必須打開每一個車廂，直到你找到金庫。

orig_text: Remember to check your Safe House regularly, you never know what could happen.
tran_text: 記得常常返回安全屋視察情況，你永遠不知道屋子裡會發生什麼事。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Criminal disconnected from the call
tran_text: 觸發警報：無線電回覆過程中斷

orig_text: YOU HAVE A NEW PARTNER IN CRIME!
tran_text: 你有一個新的犯罪夥伴！

orig_text: The printer needs paper and ink to get it going, find them!
tran_text: 影印機需要紙和墨水去運作，去找！

orig_text: Jimmy never gets to drive the escape van.
tran_text: Jimmy 永不被允許駕駛逃亡車輛。

orig_text: Jiro's body is full of traditional Yakuza tattoos.
tran_text: Jiro 全身刺滿了日本黑道的傳統刺青。

orig_text: Take all the winch parts to the vault and set them up!
tran_text: 把鉤繩零件帶到金庫那然後把它組裝起來！

orig_text: Take the bomb parts from the containers and take them to the boat.
tran_text: 從貨櫃將炸彈部件運到船。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up.$NL; $AMMO_LEFT;% ammo left.
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拾起。$NL;剩下 $AMMO_LEFT;% 彈藥。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the Printing Plate
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿走印刷版

orig_text: Get Hoxton to the armored truck out on the street.
tran_text: 護送 Hoxton 到街道上的裝甲車上。

orig_text: Collect a ticket to the garage. This will open the gate.
tran_text: 從票機中拿張票可以打開這扇門。

orig_text: Use a flare to mark the pick up location.
tran_text: 使用火炬標示接應地點

orig_text: Get off the dock gate and blow it up.
tran_text: 離開港口大門並炸掉它

orig_text: Kill Ernesto Sosa and his goons.
tran_text: 殺死 Ernesto Sosa 及他的手下。

orig_text: The ECM Feedback function of ECM Jammers regenerates every 4 minutes.
tran_text: ECM干擾器的反饋功能，每4分鐘就能再使用一次。

orig_text: Get into the house and meet Hector's cooks
tran_text: 進入房子去找 Hector 的製毒台

orig_text: The scanner has an extra security step. We need confirmation by using the lead scientist hand. Find him!
tran_text: 掃瞄器有額外的保全步驟。我們需要用科學家首領認證，找到他！

orig_text: Let the truck driver know you're ready to continue.
tran_text: 讓撤離車司機知道你們準備好走了。

orig_text: Once everyone is past the trap, ignite it.
tran_text: 一旦所有人通過陷阱，點燃它。

orig_text: Bain has prepared a starter kit for you
tran_text: Bain 為你準備了新手裝備

orig_text: Find and hack the voting machines
Place the fireworks at the indicated spot.
tran_text: 在標識的地點放置煙火。

orig_text: One of the wagons was transporting C4, look for the crate with explosives.
tran_text: 其中一個車廂運送C4，尋找裝有爆裂物的箱子。

orig_text: Pull the switch and escape now or forever be trapped in this nightmare.
tran_text: 拉動開關以撤離或永遠被夢魘困住。

orig_text: Attach the canisters of liquid nitrogen to the vault door.
tran_text: 連接液態氮到金庫門上。

orig_text: Communicate with your teammates - teamwork is key to survival.
tran_text: 多點與隊友溝通－－團隊合作是生存的關鍵。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Hoxton 對話

orig_text: Shout at the pilot to wake him up
tran_text: 對飛機駕駛大喊把他叫起來

orig_text: Un-tied civilians will get back up and run off if left unattended. Use your Cable ties to avoid it.
tran_text: 沒束縛好的平民會趁你們一不留神時就是自行站起來逃之夭夭。慎防憾事生，縛帶不要省。

orig_text: Get to the van and escape from the premises!
Find a way to get the vault open. Crowbars can be jammed into the ventilation fans, which will affect the cooling system and engage the automatic failsafe. Crowbars can be found inside the warehouse.
tran_text: 想辦法打開金庫。通風扇可以被鐵撬堵住，這樣可以影響冷卻系統並觸發故障安全防護裝置。在倉庫裡可以找到鐵撬。

orig_text: Gather the paintings in a pile. They will make a nice bonfire.
tran_text: 放畫到一個位置，它們會造出很好的篝火。
偷走 VR 頭戴裝置
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以賭 $10,000 是黑色

orig_text: Escape with the helicopter or stay and look for more loot.
tran_text: 搭直升機逃走或留下來搜尋更多贓物。

orig_text: Prevent your escape being tracked by using C4 to destroy Murkywater's radar and communication equipment.
tran_text: 使用 C4 炸毀黑水的雷達和通訊設備為你的逃亡之路保駕護航。

orig_text: Plant C4 on the floor of the Gambling Hall. There are two spots. One of them will be the weak spot. There's enough C4 to blow both.
tran_text: 在賭場大廳裝設 C4 。有兩個位置。其中之一是金庫弱點。我們有足夠的C4炸開兩個。

orig_text: Find the laptop, harddrive, USB stick, tablet and the phone
tran_text: 找出筆電、硬碟、隨身碟、平板電腦和手機

orig_text: Keep moving. We need to find that computer.
tran_text: 保持移動，我們需要找到那電腦。
給 Locke 的直升機打信號

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to switch fire mode.$NL; $AMMO_LEFT;% ammo left.
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以轉換開火模式。$NL;剩下 $AMMO_LEFT;% 彈藥。

orig_text: Use the terminal to upload shipping information to Bain, which he'll use to try and track the correct truck.
tran_text: 用終端機上傳運輸資料給 Bain ，他能藉此試著找出正確的卡車。

orig_text: Bodhi used to be a member of a gang called the Ex-Presidents.
tran_text: Bodhi 曾經是犯罪組織「Ex-Presidents」的一員。

orig_text: Bonnie used to be a honeymoon murderer, marrying and then murdering her husbands for insurance money.
tran_text: Bonnie 曾經幹過所謂的蜜月殺手－－跟人結婚然後謀害丈夫來騙取保險金的那種人。

orig_text: Make your way into the server room

tran_text: 擋住 Sosa 的保安設備

orig_text: Use the power breaker in the hangar to turn the floodlights on
tran_text: 把在倉庫的總電源打開以開啟路燈

orig_text: You need to restart the data scrambling
tran_text: 你需要重啟程式以擾亂投票資料

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to fill the water tank
Look around outside near the train bridge for winch parts.
tran_text: 在火車橋附近尋找鉤繩零件。

orig_text: Use a flare to signal the helicopter to come.
tran_text: 點燃信號彈給直升機信號。

orig_text: The alarm has triggered the security system of the supply closets. Hack the security computer to disable these locks.
tran_text: 警報觸動導致儲物間被上鎖，去駭入警衛室的電腦以解鎖。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to bag a piece of samurai armor
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 打包一部分的武士裝甲

orig_text: The mechanic wants you to collect specific tools from the workshop. Search through the toolboxes and bring it to him!
tran_text: 機械師需要你去工作坊中收集特定工具。搜尋工具箱及帶到他那裡！

orig_text: Keep the cops away from the saw!
Locate crates that contain voting machines and then hack the voting machines.
tran_text: 找出裝有投票機器的木箱並駭入機器。

orig_text: Events are heists that take place during special events, like Halloween. Expect some crazy things to happen.
tran_text: 每逄節日都會有限時推出的特殊劫案，例如萬聖節。你可以期待會有瘋狂的事件等待著你。

orig_text: You can keep having the elves produce more presents, or you can leave. But remember - at Christmas, the more the merrier!
tran_text: 你可以繼續讓妖精製作更多的禮物，或者你可以撤離。但記住 － 聖誕節，就是越多越幸福啊！
接住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以開動影印機

orig_text: Locke's helicopter is waiting to collect the pallets. Ignite the flare to bring him in.
tran_text: Locke 的直升機正等著收集貨運板。點燃信號彈通知他。

orig_text: Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 上拜訪 Gage 去看獎勵

orig_text: Get the server from the limo and make your way to the transfer room to plug it in.
tran_text: 在加長車中拿到伺服器及拿到交易室以插入電源。

orig_text: Go the security room and steal the security footage.
tran_text: 到保安室偷取監視紀錄。

orig_text: Find a way to get inside the gallery
Escort Hoxton to the Central Server Room
tran_text: 護送 Hoxton 到中央控制室。

orig_text: Join with Locke near the surface exit.
tran_text: 地面出口附近會見 Locke 。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw an open vault and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現打開的金庫並通報警察

orig_text: Press TAB to get more info on your objectives
tran_text: 按住 Tab 來檢視更多有關任務目標的訊息

orig_text: Pick up the information about Mendoza
tran_text: 撿起有關 Mendoza 的資料

orig_text: We can't transport the meth until it is in smaller pieces. Break it down into smaller pieces and bag it.
tran_text: 我們不能運送這麼大的毒品除非弄小，砸成小塊然後打包。

orig_text: Make your way to the escape
Find the management section of the nightclub.
tran_text: 尋找夜總會的管理辦公室。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the liquid meth
Continue chasing Matt. Capture him alive!
Wait for the helicopter pilot. He will drop something to help you.
tran_text: 等待直升機機師。他會丟下一個東西來幫助你。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Jiro 對話

orig_text: Rust is marked for death by Overkill MC.
tran_text: Rust 已被 Overkill 電單車幫會列為已死之人。

orig_text: If you see a little ghost symbol next to a heist on Crime.net, the mission can be completed in Stealth. If there isn't one, you can only do it Loud.
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 中，如果劫案名稱旁邊有一個小鬼標誌的話，就代表該劫案可以潛行方式來完成，否則就只能火併完成。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to arrive while looking for loot in the forest.
tran_text: 在森林找贓物途中等待直升機抵達

orig_text: Maximum Force Responders are outfitted with tan or gray body armor. Most weapons won't penetrate it, so aim for the head or flank them.
tran_text: 重裝反應部隊 Maximum Force Responders 身穿棕黃色或灰色迷彩的防彈護甲，能抵禦一般武器的攻擊，所以請瞄準他們的頭部攻擊，或是合作包抄他們。
安全運走更多禮物或者撤離

orig_text: Hold the fort and let the thermite burn through the floor. There are two cans of thermite hidden inside the copy machine, if both are carried to the vault it will speed up the melting process.
tran_text: 堅守陣線直到鋁熱劑燒了個洞。影印機那邊藏了兩罐鋁熱劑，如果把那兩罐帶過來一起燒會加速熔化過程。

orig_text: Connect the winch to the vault
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to talk to John Wick
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 John Wick 對話

orig_text: Pick up the drill the helicopter dropped for you, then mount the drill on the vault door.
tran_text: 撿起直升機丟下的鑽機，將它架設在金庫門上。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來連接到裝備
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿起 BCI 頭盔

orig_text: The escape van can't arrive until you move the police cars out of the way.
tran_text: 除非你移走警車，不然撤離車不能入來。

orig_text: Climb the telephone pole connected to the mansion.
tran_text: 爬上連接別墅的電線桿。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to use the thermal drill
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 使用熱能鑽機

orig_text: Bodhi despises Tasers. Try shooting one with the Platypus Sniper Rifle when playing as him.
tran_text: Bodhi 鄙視電擊兵 Tasers。下次不妨扮演他，用 Platypus 狙擊槍擊殺他們試試看。

orig_text: Escort the prisoner to the top of the right tower. When he's at the top, strap him down in the chair and send him skyward with the balloon.
tran_text: 護送那名囚犯到大橋右側的塔頂。當他到達塔頂，將他縛緊在椅子上，利用氣球將他空運送走。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a sentry gun
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到自動炮台

orig_text: Drive to the pick up zone
One of the money pallets has broken and cash is scattered about the town. Collect them and put them back on the pallet.
tran_text: 其中之一的載錢貨盤摔壞了並散落在城裡。收集它們並放回貨運版上。

orig_text: Locate the crash site and see if any evidence can be removed.
tran_text: 找到墜落地點，看看有沒有證據可以消滅。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick the powerbox lock
The escape is now available. The van is waiting for you. You can leave or stay for more loot.
tran_text: 現在可以撤離了，廂型車在等著你。你可以撤離或留下來搜刮更多的贓物。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to drop off the C4 on the roof!
tran_text: 等待直昇機 C4 投放到天台！

orig_text: Breach the bank near the polling stations
tran_text: 入侵在投票所旁的銀行

orig_text: Gain access to the Murkywater compound. Descend from the roofs, or use the ziplines.
tran_text: 前往黑水的地盤。從屋頂上跑酷下來，或是用滑索空降。

orig_text: Put your mask on to start the heist.
Proceed further inside the FBI headquarters.
tran_text: 繼續前往 FBI 總部。

orig_text: Drive the rubber boat along the sewers to reach Locke and the helicopter.
tran_text: 在下水道駕駛橡皮艇到 Locke 和直升機處。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a saw
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到電鋸

orig_text: Wait for the hacking to finish
Secure the loot in the helicopter
Alarm tripped: Police detected a hacked computer
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到被駭客入侵的電腦

orig_text: Find the bank manager - look for a yellow outline once he's identified. You need his keycard to access the server room.
tran_text: 找到銀行經理，被找到的話將會有黃色外框辨認。你會需要他身上的鑰匙卡進到伺服室。

orig_text: The escape boat will be waiting for you at the lake in a couple of minutes.
tran_text: 撤離船會在數分鐘內到湖上等你。
把關著伺服器的鐵捲門鑽開

orig_text: Retrieve the equipment Locke has arranged.
Find your way to the armory in guards' locker room. That is where you will collect the C4.
tran_text: 進入安保裝備室，在那裡你可以找到 C4

orig_text: Visit the FBI files to read about the Payday gang, Special Enforcers and the Heists.
tran_text: 你可以透過 FBI 檔案去進一步了解 Payday 幫成員的背景，特種部隊的詳情，以及各個劫案。

orig_text: Play with your teammates and support them - on your own, you stand less of a chance to survive.
tran_text: 如果你是在跟隊友一起玩，請主動支援他們－－孤軍作戰只會令你更難存活。

orig_text: Drill through the vault door using the Thermal Drill.
tran_text: 使用鑽機鑽開金庫大門。

orig_text: Stay cool and defend the coke, the boat is on its way
tran_text: 保持警戒並防守古柯鹼，船在他的路上了。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to re-wire the time lock
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 接時間鎖的線

orig_text: Use the radio inside one of the buildings and call the Moretta's captain. Bain will talk with him and convince him to move the ship.
tran_text: 使用其中一棟建築物裡的無線電與 Moretta 的船長通信。Bain 會說服他移動船隻。

orig_text: The escape vehicle is on the way. Survive til it arrives!
tran_text: 逃亡車輛正在路上了。活下去直到他抵達！

orig_text: Disable the camera with the ECM Jammer.
tran_text: 使用電子干擾器以關掉攝像頭。

orig_text: Hoxton has copied all the information he found to a server, which must be brought to the escape vehicle.
tran_text: Hoxton 把所有它找到的資料裝進伺服器了，伺服器要運到逃脫車輛上。

orig_text: Enter the car shop to take shelter from the blast, and get the car keys
tran_text: 進入車店並找掩護躲避爆炸，然後拿車鑰匙

orig_text: Attach the C4 to the safe using the hole you just drilled. Let the water and explosion force the safe open from within!
tran_text: 用你們剛鑽出來的洞來連接 C4 到保險箱。讓水和爆炸的威力從中打開保險箱！

orig_text: Decide on a location where you want to intercept the package. Blow up the train or infiltrate the dockyard? Remember, only Plan A can be done quietly.
tran_text: 決定一個你想要攔截包裹的位置。炸掉火車或是滲透船塢？記住，只有 A 計畫可以安靜的實行。

orig_text: Got a gadget? Turn it on by pressing the "GADGET ON/OFF" button.
tran_text: 你帶了道具嗎？按「啟動／關閉道具」鍵就能使用它。

orig_text: Light a flare on the roof to signal Bile to drop some C4 on the roof using his helicopter.
tran_text: 在天台點燃信號彈以示意 Bile 用直昇機投下一些 C4 到天台。

orig_text: Find and scan a test subject
The helicopter is taking off, everyone needs to be inside the truck!
tran_text: 直升機要接走貨車了，全員快進到貨車來！
你受傷了 － 快找掩護！

orig_text: Find the laptops with the vault codes
Find a way to open the reinforced door
Bag up the gold and hide it in the correct container.
tran_text: 打包黃金然後把它們藏在正確的集裝箱。

orig_text: To continue the trade, make sure everyone is in the train cart
tran_text: 為了繼續交易，確保每個人都在車廂內

orig_text: Head down to the bottom of the yacht and gain access to the server room
tran_text: 去遊艇底部以進入伺服器室

orig_text: Look for the keycards, you need 2 of them to open the dock gate. Check inside the buildings for them. Look on the tables and near computers. Check the locker room, too. Don't waste your time looking for them outside.
tran_text: 去找鑰匙卡，你需要兩張才能打開港口大門。到建築物裡找，注意桌上和電腦。別忘了衣物間。別浪費時間在外面找卡。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the sleeping gas
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿起催眠瓦斯

orig_text: Find and enter the wine store on the first floor.
tran_text: 找到在一樓的紅酒店並進入。

orig_text: Use keycards carried by employees to gain access to open the time locks. If things go loud, override the panels.
tran_text: 使用員工身上的鑰匙卡來打開時間鎖，如果事跡敗露，強行覆寫面板。
等待直昇機  ( 阿米蒂奇大道 )

orig_text: Wait for devices to finish hacking.
The hose has come loose, reconnect it to start pumping again.
tran_text: 水管鬆脫了，重新連接以繼續灌水。

orig_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
tran_text: 鎖定降落在城裡某處的載錢貨盤。檢查樓頂和建築內。

orig_text: Send up the Balloon so George can fly in and pick up the Ejection Seat.
Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 上拜訪 Gage 去看獎勵

orig_text: Locate a ceiling lift inside the workshop. Plug it into the outlet and turn it on. Collect both parts and deliver them to the mechanic!
tran_text: 找到工作坊內的升降台。接上插座及開啟它。拿到兩個部件及給機械師！

orig_text: Caution! Guards may see your gun this close!
tran_text: 危險！這麼近的話警衛可能會見到你的槍！

orig_text: Cut the alarm wires to the server room
Use the drill to get to the vault
Throw the engine into the helicopter and wait for it to be analyzed
tran_text: 將引擎丟進直升機並等待引擎被分析

orig_text: Press jump to be released from custody
The crane is moving the trap now, wait for it to get into place.
tran_text: 起重機正在移動陷阱，等待它進入預定位置。

orig_text: Enter the Dockyard and start looking for the 2 keycards.
tran_text: 進入船塢，開始找出兩張鑰匙卡。

orig_text: I saw a few artifacts lying about, there's always more room for extra loot.
tran_text: 我看到了有些藝術在那裡，這裡有空間給予額外贓物。

orig_text: Find a way of entering the warehouse grounds.
Empty the vault! Get the cash!
Time to leave with the boat.
Move all the goats to the truck and load them into the cage.
tran_text: 把所有羊趕進卡車並裝進籠子裡.

orig_text: To easily dominate a cop, try to deal some damage before shouting at them.
tran_text: 想更容易令警察投降，你可以先打傷他後才呼喝他。

orig_text: Press left or right on the Directional Buttons if you want to switch weapon.
tran_text: 如果你想切換武器，按下方向按鍵的左或右。

orig_text: Hold the fort and keep an eye on the saws.
You need a keycard to disable the display case alarm
tran_text: 你需要鑰匙卡解除展示櫃警報

orig_text: Move the police car from the truck's path.
tran_text: 把車從撤離車的路徑上移開。

orig_text: Place the C4 on the dock gate.
tran_text: 在碼頭的大門放置 C4 。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a saw and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民注意到電鋸並通報警察

orig_text: Shoot the wires to make the limo drop
tran_text: 射斷鋼纜以令加長車掉下來

orig_text: Search the arena for a fire extinguisher and put the fire out!
tran_text: 尋找這區域的滅火器並滅火！

orig_text: Stay alive until the new escape vehicle arrives
tran_text: 在新的撤離車輛來之前活下來

orig_text: Houston thinks Hoxton is an idiot.
tran_text: Houston 一直認為 Hoxton 是個白痴。

orig_text: Take the hard drive with the security footage.
tran_text: 拿走載有監視紀錄的硬碟。

orig_text: Carry the loot to the boat
Bodhi isn't just in it for the money.
tran_text: Bodhi 之所以搶劫並不單純是為了金錢。

orig_text: Hold out until the voting data has been scrambled
tran_text: 在擾亂投票資料完成之前撐住

orig_text: The helicopter needs to refill, it should come back in a couple of minutes. Stand your ground until it comes back.
tran_text: 直升機需要補給，他會在數分鐘內回來。你要在他回來前堅守陣地。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a fire and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現火焰並通報警察
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Clover 對話

orig_text: Bring any evidence related to Hoxton's case to the Laboratory for analysis.
tran_text: 帶任何關於 Hoxton 的證據到實驗室分析。

orig_text: Use the zipline to reach the trains on the bridge.
tran_text: 使用滑索到達在橋上的滑索。

orig_text: You have run out of time! Use the escape button to leave.
tran_text: 時間到了！按下撤離按鈕離開。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a broken camera
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到被破壞的攝影機

orig_text: Look for paintings that have the red "sold" sticker on them
tran_text: 找到貼有紅色"售出"貼紙的畫作

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the printer ink
Find and subdue the FBI boss
tran_text: 找到並威嚇 FBI 老闆

orig_text: In Casing Mode, you can still be detected, especially if you collide with guards, but the range at which guards will begin detecting you is greatly reduced.
tran_text: 踩點模式時，你會有機會被警衛察覺到你身上藏有武器－－尤其是如果你好跟警衛撞個滿懷。不過警衛對你提高警覺的距離會比其他模式時大幅減少。

orig_text: Secure the loot in the escape vehicle
tran_text: 將贓物丟到撤離車輛裡

orig_text: Take another engine to the helicopter
tran_text: 將另一台引擎丟進直升機

orig_text: Connect the power to the BFD
tran_text: 將電源線連接到鑽機老母上

orig_text: Wait for Hoxton's security clearance requests
tran_text: 等待 Hoxton 要求解鎖資料

orig_text: SWAT Van Turrets repair themselves twice -- each time after their shield breaks.
tran_text: SWAT裝甲車炮台每當護盾被擊毀時都會自我維修－－它總共會維修兩次。

orig_text: Let Bain tell you how to enter the safe.
tran_text: 讓 Bain 告訴你如何進入保險箱。

orig_text: Patience is a virtue! It's gonna take a couple of minutes to fill it up so dig in and stay alive.
tran_text: 等待是美德！填滿它將會花費一些時間，在那之前努力活下來吧。

orig_text: Steal the cocaine from the safe.

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿取舊紅酒

orig_text: Haul and deposit bags of diamonds in the trunk of Mr. Blonde's car.
tran_text: 將裝袋的鑽石搬到 Blonde 先生的車上。

orig_text: Find a scanner in the I.T.. Scan the blueprints and fax them over to Bain.
tran_text: 在電腦房這裡找台掃描儀。掃描藍圖然後傳真給 Bain。

orig_text: Ok guys we also need a briefcase that is supposed to be down here. Find it!
tran_text: 好，大家，我們還需要一個公文包，它應該在實驗室。找到它！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: An explosion was heard
tran_text: 觸發警報：爆炸聲被聽見了

orig_text: If you want a challenge, or just want to have some fun, you can activate some Mutators.
tran_text: 無論你是想挑戰更高難度，還是想試些好玩的，你都可以在劫案中開啟一些突變效果。

orig_text: You got your part of the loot, now someone else needs to carry the rest.
tran_text: 你拿夠了你的贓物了，現在其他人需要拿其他的。

orig_text: Set a drill up on the cage doors and wait for them to open.
tran_text: 在鐵籠門上安置鑽機等待它打開。

orig_text: Find and hack the correct computer
tran_text: 找到並駭入正確的電腦

orig_text: Locate all of the different parts of the EMP bomb.
tran_text: 找到 EMP 炸彈的所有不同部件。

orig_text: You can pour out another can of thermite to speed up the process.
tran_text: 你可以倒另一桶鋁熱劑以加速進度。

orig_text: Find the circuitbreaker to turn the power back on and continue the upload
tran_text: 找到變電箱打開電源以繼續上傳
把古柯鹼運到安全的地方

orig_text: John Wick once killed three men in a bar. With a pencil.
tran_text: John Wick 曾經在酒吧裡用一支鉛筆殺了三個人。

orig_text: We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Four bags should do it. Same drop off point.
tran_text: 我們要帶回步哨塔和一些彈藥，4包就夠了。放在一樣的投包點。

orig_text: Wait for the water to fill the wagon
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hacked computer
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到被駭客入侵的電腦

orig_text: You will need hostages! Tie down civilians with $BTN_INTERACT; to take them hostage.
tran_text: 你會需要人質！按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 綁住市民使他們成為人質。

orig_text: Use the meth lab to cook meth and defend your position.
tran_text: 用製毒實驗室製作冰毒並防守你的所在地

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pump gas into the vent
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 將催眠瓦斯送入通風管

orig_text: Wait for the liquid nitrogen to fully empty into the vault door.
tran_text: 等待液態氮完全倒入金庫門內。

orig_text: Welcome to my world, to my prison! I'll make you feel right at home. But you won't like the food - or anything else!
tran_text: 歡迎來到我的世界，我的監獄！我會令你有家的感覺。但你不會喜歡食物 － 或者其他東西！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected an explosion
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到爆炸

orig_text: Get out of here and head to the plane!
Saw off the beams above and below the panic room to detach it from the floor.
tran_text: 鋸開連接安全室的橫樑以令它與樓層分離。

orig_text: Defend the wheel, don't let anyone disable it or there will be a penalty!
tran_text: 保護轉盤，不要讓人停止它，否則有懲罰！

orig_text: Enter the airport and locate the weapon shipment
tran_text: 進去機場並找到武器所在地

orig_text: Carry the loot to the plane
Use the crane to lift the container containing the gold onto the truck.
tran_text: 使用起重機吊起裝有黃金的集裝箱到卡車上。

orig_text: Three different numbers form the access code for the armory. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 軍械庫三位不同的通行密碼。你需要得到他們所有。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: Use the crane to lift the container with the trap.
tran_text: 使用起重機吊起帶有陷阱的集裝箱。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to cut open the tarp
Open the safe by the counter to access the VR headset.
tran_text: 打開收銀處的保險箱以拿到 VR 頭戴裝置。

orig_text: Grab the shoes and bring them back to the Christmas tree!
tran_text: 拿走那鞋再帶回聖誕樹！

orig_text: Houston has many problems, but the cops ain't one.
tran_text: Houston 有很多煩惱，但顯然條子不是其中之一。

orig_text: Jacket likes his collection of Melee weapons.
tran_text: Jacket 很喜歡他珍藏的近戰武器。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to hack the ship control terminal
tran_text: 按住$BTN_INTERACT;來駭入船隻控制系統

orig_text: Stockholm Syndrome: No hostage available for trade
tran_text: 斯德哥爾摩症候群：沒有可交易人質

orig_text: Sniper Rifles can penetrate thin walls. Use this to your advantage.
tran_text: 狙擊槍可以打穿較薄的牆壁，請善用這個優勢。

orig_text: Wait for the poison to work
Trick the FBI HQ by contacting them via the communication relay and request the daily code.
tran_text: 通過通訊中繼器與 FBI 聯繫，並要求每日安全碼。

orig_text: Blow a hole in the wall
Dragan spends a fortune on healthy food.
tran_text: Dragan 把錢都花在健康食品上。
重啟程式以擾亂投票資料

orig_text: Make an improvised runway for a plane by marking the road with signal flares.
tran_text: 用信號彈做出一個自製的飛機跑道。

orig_text: Find and break into the correct railcar
tran_text: 找到並潛入正確的車廂

orig_text: Check the cable leading from it to get the door open.
tran_text: 檢查繩索引導到正確位置來打開門

orig_text: Find the last number used for the vault code
tran_text: 找到金庫密碼最後一位

orig_text: Connect the winch hook to the vault door!
Approve Hoxton's security clearance request on the secure file he needs.
tran_text: 允許 Hoxton 要清除的保安資料的權限。

orig_text: Get to the roof and escape!
Make your way further inside the museum.
tran_text: 用你的方法更深入博物館內部

orig_text: An escape vehicle is on its way
tran_text: 一架撤離直升機在路上

orig_text: Answer the phone to make the trade
Attach the wires to the Christmas tree
Wait for Bain to get the code from the CFO.
tran_text: 等待 Bain 在總裁身上取得密碼。
需要科學家首領的手掌

orig_text: Keep moving. We need to find that server room.
tran_text: 保持移動，我們需要找到伺服器房。

orig_text: Scan the blueprints and fax them to Bain
Pick up the loose cash bundles on the table
tran_text: 把那些放在桌上的幾疊錢撿起來
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿取舊文件

orig_text: Check the computer to see if the shop has the shoes in stock.
tran_text: 檢查電腦以看看有沒有鞋存貨。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to toggle between explosive and sensor mode
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 來切換爆炸模式或感應模式

orig_text: Kill the guard without alerting the cameras.
tran_text: 殺死警衛而攝像頭沒有警報。

orig_text: We need that saw to free the captain of the ship. Grab it
tran_text: 我們需要電鋸以釋放船長，去拿吧。

orig_text: Get to the truck with the gold and get out of here.
tran_text: 進入裝著黃金的卡車然後離開那裡。

orig_text: Clover's name is a reference to her being a lucky heister. And she is.
tran_text: Clover 的名字是用來提醒他人她是個帶來幸運的劫匪，這是真的。

orig_text: Find and use two keycards to open the Panic Room door.
tran_text: 找出並使用兩張鑰匙卡打開避難室。

orig_text: Open the grate and enter the storm drains. Escape the storm drains and say hi to the pacific!
tran_text: 打開鐵柵門及進入下水道。從下水道撤離及向大西洋問好！

orig_text: Your weapons, skills, armor and Perk Deck all interact differently - take the time to read about their effects.
tran_text: 你的武器、技能、護甲和牌組都會改變你的玩法－－花點時間去閱讀它們的詳細效果。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿走巨人牙刷

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Pager operator didn't receive an answer
tran_text: 觸發警報：無線電中心人員沒收到無線電回報
按住 $BTN INTERACT; 點燃陷阱

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to use the ECM jammer
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 使用電子干擾器

orig_text: We need to get the Taxman to the transfer room we started out in. Use all necessary force to make him cooperate.
tran_text: 我們需要帶稅務員到我們的起始點 － 交易室。使用必要的武力以確保他合作。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected an open vault
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到金庫被打開

orig_text: Know your enemy. Tasers can be identified by their dark blue and yellow armor.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。Tasers 是身穿深藍色帶著鮮黃條紋的護甲。

orig_text: Holding the "Melee" button allows you to charge Melee weapons for a more powerful attack.
tran_text: 按緊「近戰攻擊鍵」就能儲力來發出強力一擊。

orig_text: Enter the three numbers into the armory security system. Remember to put them in in the correct order.
tran_text: 把三位密碼輸入軍械庫安保系統。記住依照正確的順序輸入。

orig_text: Get into the server room to steal the access codes.
tran_text: 進入伺服器房以偷取存取代碼。

orig_text: Using Feedback on an ECM Jammer can stun some cops in the vicinity for a short duration.
tran_text: 啟動 ECM 干擾器的反饋功能，可以令周遭的警察在一段時間之内動彈不得。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the USB stick

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_USE_ITEM; 以放置急救包。

orig_text: Enter the bunker located in the backyard. Collect the seat and bring it to the mechanic!
tran_text: 進入後院的地堡。拿到坐墊及帶到機械師！

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up casino chips
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿起賭場籌碼

orig_text: You can't just knock and walk in, so make your way to the office and pick the lock on the door.
tran_text: 你不能敲敲門就走入去，所以用你的方法進入辦公室及幫門開鎖。

orig_text: The plane should be here in a couple of minutes. Wait for it until it lands.
tran_text: 直升機會在數分鐘內回來。在它降落前撐住。

orig_text: Wait for Bile to deliver the Thermal Lance
tran_text: 等待 Bile 送來熱能鑽頭

orig_text: Hold the fort while waiting for the results
tran_text: 在等待分析結果前撐住

orig_text: Take out all snipers on the rooftops around the building so that the helicopter can drop off the C4.
tran_text: 解決在周邊天台的所有狙擊手以讓直昇機能投下 C4 。

orig_text: Find a less guarded entrance into the building.
tran_text: 尋找一個比較少警衛的入口以進入建築物。
最多每關回覆 4 個無線電。

orig_text: Jump into the train to escape. There is also more loot back in the warehouse.
tran_text: 進到火車裡就能逃走，那當然倉庫裡還有更多東西能拿

orig_text: Get all of the crew into the rubber boat!
Find the safe with money in it
tran_text: 找到裝有現金的保險箱

orig_text: Use the vent near the elevator shafts to drop the money to a safe location.
tran_text: 使用電梯旁的通風口運送錢袋到安全點

orig_text: Defeat Sosa's security in the main hall
tran_text: 在主要大廳中擋住 Sosa 的保安設備。

orig_text: Get the administrator codes from the Taxman! Screams, threats and a good old beating - anything goes - we are in a hurry!
tran_text: 在稅務員口中獲得管理員密碼！恐嚇、威脅和打擊 - 甚麼都可以 - 我們很趕忙！
自動砲台的子彈已經滿了

orig_text: Wait for the escape helicopter to arrive
They cut the power so you need to get it back on
tran_text: 你得去把他們切掉的電源打開

orig_text: Grab the C4 and use it on the construction site wall.
tran_text: 拿起 C4 炸藥，並且用在爆破隔牆。

orig_text: Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 上拜訪 Gage 去看獎勵

orig_text: The helicopter will be waiting for you at the lookout.
tran_text: 直升機將會在安全地點等你們。

orig_text: Secure the loot in the helicopter
Getting close to enemies can cause them to deal a powerful melee attack.
tran_text: 與敵人走得太近的話，小心他們獎你一記超痛的近戰攻擊。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT;  以拿取公事包

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; start copying the guest list
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 開始複製客人列表

orig_text: Take the necklace from behind the bullet proof glass and secure it for Vlad!
tran_text: 為了 Vlad 帶走在防彈玻璃後的項鍊！

orig_text: Wait for BFD to get into position
The escape helicopter will arrive soon on the roof of the bank, get the bags over there.
tran_text: 撤離直升機將會降落在屋頂上，將贓物運到那裡。

orig_text: Shoot at the cables snagging the limo to make it fall!
tran_text: 射那釣住加長車的纜繩以令它掉下來！

orig_text: Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
tran_text: 拜訪在 Crime.net 的Gage來看獎勵

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; while looking at a target to spot them.
tran_text: 當看住目標時按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以標記他們。

orig_text: Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building, the headquarters of a local gang running a lucrative drugs operation. In this building there's a panic room bolted to the floor - and inside the panic room there's a fortune in cash. $NL; $NL;Getting into the building is easy, but the panic room is a tougher nut to crack. It'll take days to cut it open, and you don't have that much time. So if you can't get in, how are you going to get to all that money? The answer is simple: steal the whole room.
tran_text: 深入這計劃，這裡有受保護的建築，當地幫派的頭目在這裡運作一個利潤豐厚的毒品廠。同時在這建築中有安全室被螺栓連接到樓層 － 安全室內充滿了現金。$NL;$NL;進入這建築很易，但安全室就像堅實的堅果難以突破。割開要整整一天但你沒有這麼多時間。所以如果你不進去，你還有甚麼方法拿到所有金錢？答案很簡單，整座安全室都偷走。

orig_text: Wait for the process to finish
Take the printing plates from within the safe.
tran_text: 從保險箱中拿出印刷版。

orig_text: Santa could not meet the quota for this year. Millions of girls and boys will go without presents.
tran_text: 聖誕老人今年完不成指標了。成千上萬的男孩女孩們將沒有禮物。

orig_text: Make your entry into the vault
tran_text: 幫自己開條進入金庫的路

orig_text: The mic recorder is hooked up. Call Ernesto Sosa in his office.
tran_text: 錄音機連接好了，在 Ernesto Sosa 的辦公室打給他。

orig_text: The Shinobi Skill Subtree make Stealth easier, but also comes with tricks to be used when the alarm is triggered.
tran_text: 鬼魅技能樹的忍者分枝令你潛行更輕鬆，但亦會提供被迫硬幹時的應戰手段。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以發訊號給 Blonde 先生

orig_text: Rust betrayed a strong brotherhood to join the Payday Gang.
tran_text: Rust 在背叛了一個強勢的兄弟幫後成為 Payday 幫的一份子。

orig_text: Find the router boxes for the security system and place the hacking devices.
tran_text: 尋找保安系統的短路盒及放置駭入裝置。

orig_text: Get the coke to the pick-up truck
tran_text: 把古柯鹼運到接應卡車

orig_text: Use crowbars to jam the vault ventilation
tran_text: 用鐵橇來堵住金庫的通風口。

orig_text: Steal all of the gold in the vault
tran_text: 偷走金庫裡的所有黃金

orig_text: As sleep takes us, we drift into that strange land beyond the waking world. And who knows what might be waiting for us there...
tran_text: 睡眠帶了我們來，在睡醒的世界中飄來奇異地方。誰知道還有甚麼在等我們 ...

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to search the portable toilet
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以搜索流動廁所

orig_text: Take the bomb parts to the boat
Look for a way inside the the chamber of the Diamond.
tran_text: 找一條進入鑽石之室的方法

orig_text: Bain wants you to throw the bag you picked up on the table
tran_text: Bain 想要你將撿到的贓物丟到桌上

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the BFD tool
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿取鑽機老母維修工具

orig_text: You're out of body bags. Get more.
tran_text: 你沒有屍袋了，去拿多點。

orig_text: We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Twelve bags should do it. Same drop off point.
tran_text: 我們要帶回步哨塔和一些彈藥，12包就夠了。放在一樣的投包點。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place the gps tracker
Start the generator to start pumping the water.
Drive to the dock yard as fast as possible!
tran_text: 把車開到港口，越快越好！

orig_text: Clear a path for the armored truck so it can continue.
tran_text: 為撤離車清出一條路徑以繼續。

orig_text: Select a vault to open first
Contact the FBI HQ and request the code
tran_text: 與 FBI 總部聯繫並取得密碼

orig_text: The captain will give you further instructions once he reaches the ship. Wait for him
tran_text: 當船長到船那邊的時候他就會告訴我們該怎麼做。等他一下吧

orig_text: Attach the magnet hanging from the helicopter to the top of the panic room.
tran_text: 連起直昇機的磁鐵和安全室頂部。

orig_text: The Ace of Spades Throwable is silent. Grenades are not. Prepare accordingly when you're planning to be sneaky.
tran_text: 在投擲類武器當中，黑桃A撲克牌是靜音的，但手榴彈不是。打算潛行的話請不要帶錯。

orig_text: Vlad's transport vans have been tossed about by the earthquake. We need to locate them.
tran_text: Vlad 貨車被地震幹翻了，我們需要找出來。

orig_text: Recover the prototype turret parts by carrying them to the drop off location.
tran_text: 把步哨塔零件帶到投包點來追回它們。

orig_text: The wall is blocking our way in. Use the anti-air missiles that we hacked and blow it up!
tran_text: 這牆擋住了我們的路，用已被我們駭入的防空導彈炸開它！

orig_text: Place the drill on the vault
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the USB stick
Plant the coke infront of the vault door
tran_text: 將古柯鹼放在金庫門的前面

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected broken voting machines
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到被開啟的損壞的投票機

orig_text: Make a decision to either steal or destroy the weapons
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the saw blade
Look around you and check if your teammates have placed equipment nearby. It is usually not as beneficial to place all equipment in the same place.
tran_text: 設置醫療包等道具前先看看附近是否有隊友設置了的道具。把相同的道具全都集中在一處並不一定是好事。

orig_text: On Crime.net you can bet your Offshore money for an "Offshore Payday".
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 中你可以花費離岸戶口的資金去進行「離岸賭博遊戲」。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to open the Security Center door
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 打開安全中心大門

orig_text: Place the paintings on the table
Alarm tripped: Police detected a fire
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到火焰

orig_text: Bile is circling nearby. Light a signal flare to bring him in.
tran_text: Bile 在附近盤旋。點燃信號彈指引他進去。

orig_text: Use the keycard to get into the hotel room. Find the vent and start pumping sleeping gas into the shaft. This will put the guards in the Security Center to sleep.
tran_text: 使用房卡進入旅館房間。找到排氣口並開始向豎井中抽氣。這回讓安保中心的守衛進入昏睡。
