orig_text: Bulldozers have a plate that protect their faces. You need to shoot away the plate before you can hand out headshots.
tran_text: Bulldozers 重裝兵的頭盔是帶有防彈面罩的。你需要先打掉面罩才能給予他們爆頭傷害。

orig_text: Use two keycards to open the Panic Room
tran_text: 用兩張鑰匙卡打開避難室

orig_text: Collect the C4 from the bag that was dropped by the chopper.
tran_text: 拿取從直升機掉落的 C4 。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police saw someone breaking and entering
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察發現有人非法入侵

orig_text: Charon is in trouble. Find a way down to the basement and meet up with him.
tran_text: Charon 有麻煩了，方法下去地下室會合。

orig_text: Use the stationary computer and open the vault door
Dip the explosive in and enjoy the show! You might want stand back a bit though.
tran_text: 引爆炸彈享受表演吧！你應該會想站後面一點。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a body bag
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到屍袋並通報警察
使用 Rust 的摩托車撤離

orig_text: Take the bomb parts from the case.
tran_text: 從箱子裡拿走炸彈部件

orig_text: Wait for the escape vehicle to arrive.
The EMP has opened the way down to the labs, get down there!
tran_text: EMP 打開了進入地下實驗室的路，快下去！

orig_text: Search the arena for the marked supply closets. You will find the C4 stashed inside them.
tran_text: 搜索已被標記的儲物間. 你們將會在裡面找到 C4 。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the caustic soda
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿走苛性蘇打[Cs]

orig_text: Secure the meth and get the bags into the van
tran_text: 將冰毒丟進廂型車以獲得它

orig_text: BFD needs a lot of electricity. Hook her up to two power sockets.
tran_text: 鑽機老母需要大量電力。將她連接到兩個電源插座上去。

orig_text: The drill is done and the vault is ready. Get in there.
tran_text: 鑽機完畢金庫已準備。進去。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 修復鑽機老母

orig_text: The printing is done. Grab the money!
Police officers will not attempt to repossess loot that has not yet been bagged.
tran_text: 警察不會對未打包進袋的贓物有任何反應。

orig_text: Use the shape-charges to blast the apartment block door.
tran_text: 用 C4 炸開公寓大門。

orig_text: Hide the body inside the janitor closet.
tran_text: 把屍體隱藏在看門人的衣櫥內。

orig_text: Find the panic room which is somewhere inside the FBI safe house. The traitor is held inside.
tran_text: 在安全屋裡找到避難室，叛徒在避難室裡。

orig_text: Lead the FBI Boss to the Panic Room
tran_text: 帶 FBI 老闆到避難室。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿起爆破炸藥

orig_text: There should be a button somewhere to open the hidden safe. It'll be hidden, so try moving or rotating vases or other obejcts.
tran_text: 應該有個按鈕以打開隱藏保險箱的，它被藏好了，所以試試搬動或轉動花瓶或其他東西。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the thermite paste

tran_text: 按下 $BTN INTERACT; 關閉百葉窗

orig_text: Find and enter the tech store on the ground floor.
tran_text: 找到在地下的科技店並進入。

orig_text: Use the panel outside of the lab in order to open the lab door
tran_text: 使用實驗室旁的控制板打開實驗室門

orig_text: Keep the cops at bay while Bain comes up with a backup plan.
tran_text: 在 Bain 想出後備方案前抵禦警察攻堅

orig_text: Make your way along the plane to reach the control panel on the upper deck.
tran_text: 找路前往飛機上甲板的控制面板。

orig_text: If you want to admire your weapon while in a heist, you can inspect it by pressing "INSPECT WEAPON" button.
tran_text: 如果你在劫案中途突然心血來潮想欣賞你的槍，你可以按「查看武器」鍵。

orig_text: Wait for the drill to lower

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以插入隨身碟

orig_text: Find the vault in a Murkywater container
tran_text: 找到有金庫的黑水貨櫃

orig_text: Black Ridge is protected by heavy blast doors. Drop off the breaching charges at the doors.
tran_text: 黑脊被厚重的防爆門保護著。把爆破炸藥扔在門上。

orig_text: Hack an FBI computer to find the panic room code.
tran_text: 駭入 FBI 電腦找出避難室密碼。

orig_text: It's an ambush! Make for the escape
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a hostage and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現人質並通報警察

orig_text: The van will be waiting for you just by the main road.
tran_text: 廂型車將會在主幹道旁等你。

orig_text: Step inside the basement to proceed
You get detected easier if you are carrying a bag.
tran_text: 背起包包時會令你更易被人發現。

orig_text: Find some thermite and place it in the bathtub to create a hole. That should surely piss him off!
tran_text: 找到一些熱熔劑並放到浴缸以燒出一個洞，那應該能令他生氣！

orig_text: Your parachutes are stored close by. Get them. You will need them.
tran_text: 你的降落傘放在附近。拿上。你會需要它們。

orig_text: Bag up the EMP parts hidden in the Murkywater Trains
tran_text: 拿走在黑水火車內隱藏的 EMP 部件。

orig_text: Return to the Operations Room to continue defending Hoxton.
tran_text: 回到控制室繼續保護 Hoxton 。

orig_text: Hack the ship control terminal to start the ship moving procedure.
tran_text: 駭入船隻控制終端來移動船隻。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a dead body
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到死屍
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿取資料夾

orig_text: Let the thermite paste do it's magic. It's chewing through tick metal but it shouldn't take too long.
tran_text: 讓鋁熱劑派上用場的時候到了，它會融化厚鐵板，這不會花太久的時間。

orig_text: No suspicious actions allowed in casing mode.
tran_text: 踩點模式不允許可疑動作。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a fire
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到火焰

orig_text: Clear obstacles in the landing area
Bag all the loot you can find in the vault.
tran_text: 打包所有你能在金庫找到的贓物

orig_text: Move back down to the new pickup spot. Don't forget about Matt!
tran_text: 回去下面去新的位置，別忘了 Matt ！

orig_text: Use the FBI boss to get past the retinal scanner on the Panic Room door by leading him to it.
tran_text: 帶 FBI 老闆到避難室，逼他用虹膜掃描器。

orig_text: Exit through the lobby entrance. Stay casual.
tran_text: 像個正常人一樣輕輕鬆鬆的走出大門

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn on ECM feedback
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 開啟干擾器反饋

orig_text: Take a look at all the stats of a weapon. High damage is not always the most efficient depending on your playstyle.
tran_text: 武器的各種數值都有它的功用。高火力的武器不一定是最切合你風格的最佳武器。

orig_text: Grab the Thermal Lance which Bile has dropped nearby.
tran_text: 去撿 Bile 剛剛送來的熱能鑽頭。

orig_text: Wait for the thermal drill to open the vault door.
tran_text: 等待熱能鑽機打開金庫門。

orig_text: Don't leave bodies around in Stealth, use a Body Bag to move them where they can't be seen.
tran_text: 潛行時避免留下屍體，使用屍袋把屍體打包並運到不會被發現的地方藏好。

orig_text: Defend the pick-up and keep the engine running

tran_text: 溫馨提示：爆頭增加傷害。

orig_text: Pick up the server from the rack
Wait for the winch to finish moving BFD into position above the vault.
tran_text: 等待絞盤將鑽機老母運送到金庫上方的位置。

orig_text: Connect the hose to the safe
Visit Gage on Crime.net to view rewards
tran_text: 在 Crime.net 上拜訪 Gage 去看獎勵

orig_text: Find two more numbers for the vault code
tran_text: 找到金庫密碼剩下兩位
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Chains 對話

orig_text: Secure more bags or wait for Twitch
tran_text: 確保更多鑽石或等待逃亡車輛

orig_text: Alex uses the crane to lift the limo from the open street ontop of the building.
tran_text: Alex 使用起重機在街中吊加長車到大樓頂部。

orig_text: The cops have turned off the power to the security computer. Throw the switch to turn it back on!
tran_text: 警察關掉保安室電腦的電源。去把開關打開！

orig_text: Hoxton is still annoyed at Houston for taking over his old mask and name.
tran_text: Hoxton 對 Houston 拿了原本屬於他的舊面具和代號一事依然耿耿於懷。

orig_text: The head of security has a USB stick needed to hack the lock system. Find him, kill him and get the usb stick.
tran_text: 警衛總管有用於駭入門鎖系統的隨身碟，找到他，殺死他，拿到隨身碟。

orig_text: Drill the door open in order to get the server
Get the whole crew into the airlock. It needs to close before the inner door opens.
tran_text: 所有成員進入氣閘艙。它會在內門關閉後關閉。

orig_text: Find and collect all the goats.
Follow the mechanic to the truck
Find wherever the gas is being dispenesed from and stop it
tran_text: 尋找氣體的源頭並停止洩漏。

orig_text: If you want, grab anything of value and throw it into the helicopter, or escape.
tran_text: 如果你想，拿到任何有價值的東西及拋到直昇機上，或撤離。

orig_text: Look out for a server room and collect your gear. It's hidden inside a copy machine.
tran_text: 在伺服室尋找並且收集所需物資。都藏在列印機裡。

orig_text: Kill the guard before he spots the broken camera.
tran_text: 在警衛看到被破壞的攝像頭前殺死他。

orig_text: Throw a bag over the yellow wall by the auto repair shop.
tran_text: 將贓物丟過汽車維修廠旁的黃色牆

orig_text: Connect the rest of the hose to the hole in the safe.
tran_text: 連接水管到保險箱上的洞

orig_text: Wolf spends a fortune on power tools.
tran_text: Wolf 把錢都花在電動工具上。

orig_text: Lift the gold out of here
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a drill
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到鑽頭

orig_text: Use your keycard to activate the prison door panel or the escape panel.
tran_text: 使用鎖匙卡以激活監獄大門面版或撤離面版。

orig_text: Secure the vault loot in the helicopter.
tran_text: 用直升機運走金庫的贓物。

orig_text: Find evidence the FBI will use against you and secure it. It should be scattered throughout the house.
tran_text: 找到那些 FBI 會用來對付你們的證據，它們應該分散在整個房間。

orig_text: Don't hurry in Stealth, take your time and let the guards pass you.
tran_text: 潛行切忌心浮氣躁。深呼吸，慢慢來，讓路過的警衛自己走開就好。

orig_text: Use a body bag to move the body.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to enter new GPS coordinates
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 輸入新的全球定位座標

orig_text: The helicopter has arrived! Escort the pilot to it.
tran_text: 直升機到了！護送駕駛到直升機。

orig_text: Throw the parts you've found into the mechanic's truck!
tran_text: 拋你找到的部件到機械師的卡車內！

orig_text: Place the C4 charges on the roof, floor 4 and 5.
tran_text: 放置 C4 炸物到天台、四樓、五樓。

orig_text: Use circle cutters to open the vaults from beneath.
tran_text: 用圓形切割器切開金庫底部。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to close the elevator door
ZEAL units are the toughest that the DHS has to offer, and are deployed only at the One Down difficulty.
tran_text: ZEAL 部隊是國土安全局旗下的最強特種部隊，他們只會在 One Down 難度劫案中登場。

orig_text: Metal detectors can instantly detect your gear. Bypass them by disabling the electricity. You are searching for electricity boxes.
tran_text: 金屬探測器可以偵測到你的裝備，把它斷電就能安全穿過它們。去找電箱。

orig_text: Sokol watches the Russian hockey league every week.
tran_text: Sokol 每週都會看俄國冰球聯盟的比賽。

orig_text: The helicopter is on its way, hold out until it arrives.
tran_text: 直升機到達前守住並且存活下來。

orig_text: Collect two cannisters of liquid nitrogen from Mr. Blonde's car out in the street.
tran_text: 從街外 Blonde 先生的車上取得兩罐液態氮。

orig_text: Hold out and wait for Bile to pick up the tree.
tran_text: 守住及等待 Bile 拾起這樹。

orig_text: Plant the c4 on the van doors and blow them open.
tran_text: 在貨車門上放置 C4 炸開門。

orig_text: Climb up the ladder and enter the hold of this Murkywater cargo plane.
tran_text: 爬上梯子然後進入黑水貨機貨艙。

orig_text: Drop the money into the truck!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the hydrogen chloride
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 來添加氯化氫[HCl]

orig_text: Pick up the thermal drill in the parking lot
Use the saw to get into the marked truck with the ballot machines
tran_text: 帶著抽籤機用鋸子進入卡車

orig_text: Identification step 1/3: Scan the thumb in the fingerprint scanner.
tran_text: 鑑定階段 1/3 ：將拇指放到指紋掃描器上

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a criminal
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到罪犯
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿取液態氮
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 下载客人名單

orig_text: Find a way into the car shop without getting detected.
tran_text: 在未被偵測的情況下進入車店

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to reignite the thermal drill
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 重新點燃熱能鑽機

orig_text: Get the vault loot to the helicopter
tran_text: 把金庫的贓物送上直升機

orig_text: See to it that the drill finishes it's job. The cops might try to turn the power off.
tran_text: 看住鑽機直到完成工作，條子可能會嘗試關上電源。

orig_text: The escape van will be waiting for you at the main road in a couple of minutes. Stay alive until then!
tran_text: 撤離廂型車會在數分鐘內到主幹道等你。在那之前保住性命吧！

orig_text: John Wick really likes his car.
tran_text: John Wick 真的很愛惜他的古董車。

orig_text: Bridge the construction hole that is blocking the truck's path.
tran_text: 在撤離車路徑上的洞上造一座橋

orig_text: We have everything we came for. Get out of here now.
tran_text: 我們拿到所有東西了。現在就離開吧。

orig_text: Red outlines around an enemy during a Loud heist indicates that they are a Special Enemy of some sorts.
tran_text: 火併時，以紅色外框標示的敵人就是特殊敵人。

orig_text: Wolf is not nice to hostages.
tran_text: Wolf 對待人質並不友善。

orig_text: The batch is done. If you want to cook another one just add some more ephadrine pills. Otherwise there is a flare ready to be lit ontop of the barrel covered with a blanket. An escape vehicle is waiting for the signal to come and pick you up.
tran_text: 這一批完成了，如果你想再煮另一批只要加入一些麻黃鹼藥片，如果不是，這裡有準備好的信號彈在桶上，撤離車在見到信號後就會來接你走。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a saw
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到電鋸

orig_text: Keep police away from the cutter or they will stop it!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to rewire the security barrier
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以重寫保安裝置

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Pager operator wasn't convinced by the answer
tran_text: 觸發警報：無線電中心人員不相信你的回覆

orig_text: Waiting for the driver to respawn the vehicle
tran_text: 等待駕駛重新安排車輛

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a dead body
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到死屍

orig_text: Check the limo and see if you can get the taxman out of it.
tran_text: 檢查加長車及看看你能不能抓稅務員出來。
燒廂型車！ ( 墨水工廠 )

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected suspicious activity
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到異常狀況

orig_text: You will get a bonus for every surviving crew member during the success screen.
tran_text: 在任務完成畫面中，每多一名存活隊友，你都會獲得一份額外獎金。

orig_text: Find and spike the correct bottle
tran_text: 找到並在正確的瓶子裡加料

orig_text: Find the server room somewhere in the democrats' apartment
tran_text: 在市議員公寓的某個地方找到伺服器房

orig_text: Take the bomb parts from the containers and take them to the van.
tran_text: 從貨櫃將炸彈部件運到廂型車。

orig_text: Transport the nuclear warheads to Vlad's train in the old dockyard.
tran_text: 將核彈頭運到舊港口 Vlad 的火車裡。

orig_text: Set two drills on the vault.
tran_text: 在金庫上設置兩個鑽機。

orig_text: Escort the CFO to the roof

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Dragan 對話

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian heard an explosion and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民聽見爆炸聲並通報警察

orig_text: Bulldozers can't be stunned or staggered in any way.
tran_text: Bulldozers 重裝兵不會被打呆，亦不會被擊退。

orig_text: You need to copy the guest list to the USB stick first
tran_text: 你需要先把客人名單拷貝到隨身碟上

orig_text: Get to the van to escape!
Kill the guard inside the security room.
Jump out of the cargo doors.
Secure the safes inside the truck
Not enough ammo to place sentry gun
tran_text: 沒有足夠彈藥以放置步哨槍

orig_text: Pick up the bag containing the thermite.
tran_text: 拿起裝有鋁熱劑的背包。

orig_text: Use the keyboard to reactivate the computer and continue the hacking.
tran_text: 用鍵盤重新啟動電腦以繼續駭入

orig_text: Search the packages in the forest for any loot and wait for the helicopter to pick it up.
tran_text: 在森林裡的包裹尋找任何贓物，等待直升機取走。

orig_text: Protect the pilot and the helicopter from incoming enemy fire while it fills the vault with water.
tran_text: 在車箱灌水時，從敵火中保護直升機和駕駛。

orig_text: Bain needs you to acquire hotel guest list. Copy it on memory stick and upload the data to him.  The best chance to find a memory stick is in the I.T. room.
tran_text: Bain 需要你獲得旅館客人的名單。拷貝進記憶棒然後上傳數據給 Bain 。找到記憶棒最好的機會是在電腦房裡。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to get back
Bain is ready to move the money - do the last step and complete the transfer!
tran_text: Bain 準備好移動金錢 - 做最後一步及完成轉移！

orig_text: Escape via the zip line on the roof next to the insertion point
tran_text: 經由屋頂上的滑索滑到投包點撤離
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 打開防盜柵欄
觸發警報：警察偵測到槍聲

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to open the guitar case
Help the mechanic and set him free off the tape!
tran_text: 幫助機械師及為他鬆綁！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw someone breaking and entering and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現非法入侵並通報警察

orig_text: Jacket doesn't like to talk about himself.
tran_text: Jacket 不喜歡提及自己的事。

orig_text: You already have the max amount.
tran_text: 你能攜帶的投擲物已達上限。

orig_text: Use ziplines in the elevator shaft to reach the surface. You can also stay and find more loot.
tran_text: 使用電梯井裡的滑索到達地面。你也可以留下找更多的贓物。

orig_text: You can easily tell how many uses a placed Doctor Bag has left by looking at the amount of blood bags left inside the bag.
tran_text: 看看設置好的醫療包，裡頭還有多少個血袋？那就是該醫療包還能使用的次數。

orig_text: Find and collect a memory stick
Looks like Charon is in trouble look for suspicious activity.
tran_text: 看來 Charon 因可疑活動有麻煩。

orig_text: A good team will have both Ammo Bags and Doctor Bags with them on the heist.
tran_text: 一支好的搶劫隊伍都會常備彈藥包和醫療包上場。

orig_text: Place the C4 explosive charges on the wall and blow it up in order to escape.
tran_text: 將 C4 裝在牆上並炸開牆來逃脫

orig_text: Hide from the blast and get the keys
tran_text: 找掩護躲避爆炸，然後拿車鑰匙

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the briefcase
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿起公事包

orig_text: The "Threat" weapon stat indicates the chance of cops avoiding fire and searching cover when you fire your gun. The higher the number, the more threatening the weapon is per shot
tran_text: 武器的「威脅度」表示當你開槍時警察會暫停開火並尋求掩護的機會有多大。威脅度越高，你每開一槍，警察越有機會被你嚇得雞飛狗跳。
幫 Vlad 找到 tiara 皇冠

orig_text: Steal as much from the depot as you can. Stay quiet.
tran_text: 從倉庫裡偷走盡可能多的東西，但保持安靜。

orig_text: Fire up the balloon when ready
Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.
tran_text: 就算是靜音電鋸還是會發出一點點噪音的。注意別讓閒雜人等接近。

orig_text: Use C4 to breach the construction site walls. Inside is a truck we can use to transport the safes.
tran_text: 拿起要爆破隔牆的 C4 炸藥，有輛我們可以利用的貨車在牆的另一邊。

orig_text: Bring the case file to Hoxton so that he can continue looking for the information he needs.
Find the electric box and cut the mains leading to the vault, to disable the electrified booby-trap.
tran_text: 找到電箱並把連接到金庫的電線剪掉以便解除電擊裝置。

orig_text: Turn off all coolent systems for the servers. That should overheat them.
tran_text: 關閉所有伺服器的冷卻系統，這應該會令系統過熱的。

orig_text: Use the thermal drill to get to the vault
Gain access to the server room
That is the wagon we were looking for. Use thermite paste to burn a hole on top of it so that the helicopter can fill it up with water.
tran_text: 這就是我們要找的車廂。用鋁熱劑在上面燒穿一個洞，等一下直升機會從洞口將水灌入車廂。

orig_text: Find a way through the entrance into the Bikers clubhouse.
tran_text: 找到方法以進入暴走族俱樂部。

orig_text: Hold out until the helicopter arrives.
Take a hostage to trade back your teammate from the cops.
tran_text: 抓住人質以從條子手上交易隊友。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以存取 PD2 儲藏

orig_text: Look for a way inside the museum.
tran_text: 找一條進入博物館的路。

orig_text: Get to the van to escape, or stay if you want to grab more loot.
tran_text: 進入廂型車逃亡。或著留下，如果你想拿更多贓物

orig_text: Bile will bring in a Thermal Lance which is needed to open the Panic Room door.
tran_text: Bile 將會帶給你們一個熱能鑽頭，用來打開避難室的。

orig_text: You need an empty water tank to fill it
Bring the loot to the escape vehicle
When Captain Winters is present he makes all enemies tougher to kill the longer he is present, including himself.
tran_text: Captain Winters 一出場，包括他自己在內的所有敵人就會逐漸變得更強悍。他逗留越久，敵人就越難殺死。

orig_text: Reconnect the BFD to the power socket.
tran_text: 把鑽機老母的電源重新插上。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to use the phone and signal the bus
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 打電話通知公車

orig_text: Move the coke somewhere safe and wait for the pick-up truck
tran_text: 把古柯鹼運到安全的地方並等待接應卡車

orig_text: Meet our Insider at the gates
Get inside and don't draw attention to yourselves!
tran_text: 進去，但別讓其他人注意到你！

orig_text: Open the Panic Room using the Thermal Lance
tran_text: 用熱能鑽頭打開避難室

orig_text: There are shipping crates stored in the clubhouse. Open them, search for an engine and deliver it to the mechanic!
tran_text: 在俱樂部內儲藏了一些運輸箱。打開它們，搜索引擎及給機械師！

orig_text: Take over Santa's Workshop and convince his elves to keep making presents. Shout at them to encourage them to work.
tran_text: 拿下聖誕工坊並說服妖精繼續製作禮物。吼他們一臉督促他們工作。

orig_text: The hacking was interupted. They have an external override. Find it and cut it.
tran_text: 駭入被停止了，他們有外置覆寫方法，找到及關掉它。

orig_text: Move the hostage to a safer location.
tran_text: 移動人質到更安全的地方。

orig_text: Find the server and scramble the voting data
tran_text: 找到伺服器並擾亂投票資料

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Criminal triggered a motion sensor
tran_text: 觸發警報： 一名罪犯觸發了移動感應器

orig_text: While getting tased by a Taser, try shooting the Taser in order to free yourself.
tran_text: 當你慘遭電擊兵 Taser 電擊時，嘗試對他射擊來打斷他。

orig_text: Secure the BCI Helmet in the helicopter
tran_text: 在直昇機奪取 BCI 頭盔

orig_text: You're not carrying the glass cutter.
tran_text: 你沒有攜帶玻璃切割器。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿 VR 頭戴裝置

orig_text: Defend the computer while we hack into the garage security system.
tran_text: 防守電腦直到駭入車庫保全系統。

orig_text: Our Insider is heading from the second floor to the gate. She will be ready to lead you through them. Act casual and don't draw any attention to yourselves!
tran_text: 我們的內應正從二樓前往閘門。她會安排帶你們穿越閘門。你們前往時小心點不要引人注目！

orig_text: Locate and enter the toy store on the ground floor.
tran_text: 找到在地下的玩具店並進入。

orig_text: Connect the wires to the tree so the helicopter can airlift it out!
tran_text: 連接鋼纜到樹以讓直昇機運走它！

orig_text: Open up the Gensec truck and steal its contents
tran_text: 打開Gensec卡車，然後偷走車上的東西。

orig_text: You got the minimum amount of bags secured. Stay and cook more or get ready to escape.
tran_text: 你做完最少包的交易量了。留下來繼續製毒或者準備好撤離。
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Jacket 對話

orig_text: Time to leave. Gather on the boat.
Wait for the negotiations to end
The blue containers will lead you to the gold, follow them!
tran_text: 藍色集裝箱將指引你至黃金，跟著它們！

orig_text: Use the keypad to start the time lock on the door which will open the security gate to the vault area.
tran_text: 把讓你與金庫區域相隔的那扇大門用密碼打開時間鎖。

orig_text: Use the planks on windows, vents and fences in order to barricade them
tran_text: 用木板封住窗戶、通風口及籬笆

orig_text: Locate the shopping bag with the toy
The cops have extinguished the flare. Get it lit again.
tran_text: 條子熄滅了信號彈。重新點燃。

orig_text: Find your way into the nightclub
Wait for the skylight barrier hack to finish.
Use the drill parts to set up the Beast.
Set up your drill on the safe to drill it.
tran_text: 在保險箱上設定鑽機以鑽開它。

orig_text: Use the keycard provided by Locke to initiate the airlock opening sequence.
tran_text: 把包掛在電梯井裡的滑索上。Locke 會保證它安全。

orig_text: Pick up the thermal drill in the elevator
tran_text: 把放在停車場的熱能鑽頭撿起
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Ethan 對話

orig_text: Hold out until Bain finds an escape
tran_text: 等待直到 Bain 找到撤離位置
找到 Hoxton 的訴訟文件
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 下載數據密鑰

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick the turtle up

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 對駕駛打信號

orig_text: That guard is in the way. Take him out.
tran_text: 那警衛擋住路了，殺死他。

orig_text: Be careful of tossing Grenades at cops. They can easily shoot it out of the air.
tran_text: 向警察投擲手榴彈時要小心。有沒有聽過他們會射爆空中的手榴彈的八掛？

orig_text: The Brawler Skill Subtree focuses on Melee weapons. Be it fists, knives, or any other melee attack.
tran_text: 逃犯技能樹的格鬥家分枝主要集中於近戰武器，包括拳頭、小刀，以及任何近戰攻擊。

orig_text: We need to make the truck lighter. Remove the armor plating so you can escape.
tran_text: 我們需要讓撤離車輕一點，把車上的裝甲拆掉以逃亡。

orig_text: Cut a hole in the floor
Use C4 to breach the wall
tran_text: 使用 C4 炸藥爆破隔牆

orig_text: Find the address, locate the safe and open it up
tran_text: 找到放有地址的保險箱並打開

orig_text: Vlad has all the presents he needs. You can continue to make more presents or wait to escape.
tran_text: Vlad 拿到了他需要的禮物。你可以繼續製作更多的禮物或等待撤離。

orig_text: Keep the cops at bay while the drills finish doing their job.
tran_text: 在鑽機完成前別讓警察靠近。

orig_text: Escort the pilot to the lumber yard
Kill the traitor for his betrayal.
tran_text: 讓叛徒為了他的蠢行為付出代價。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place the water tank
Gain access to the vault doors
Signal a helicopter to come in and get you out of the museum.
tran_text: 給直昇機發信號等他帶你撤離博物館

orig_text: Sokol spends a fortune on ice hockey gear.
tran_text: Sokol 把錢花在冰上曲棍球的裝備上。

orig_text: Get the code from the managers computer
tran_text: 用經理的電腦取得密碼

orig_text: Investigate the facility with the console panel.
Escort Mr. Pink back to the warehouse
tran_text: 護 Mr. Pink 回到會合點。

orig_text: Bain spends a fortune on bribes and informants.
tran_text: Bain 會把錢都花在收買線人和建立情報網上。

orig_text: Keep the cops from stopping the winch.
Find and free Santa - Vlads drunken brother in law. He should be inside the mall somewhere.
tran_text: 找到並為聖誕老人鬆綁 － Vlad 的姐夫喝醉了，他應該在廣場內某處。

orig_text: Find and steal the wine box
Wait for the hack to finish and make sure the power stays on.
tran_text: 等待駭入完成並確保電源保持開啟。

orig_text: Find and enter the shoe store on the first floor.
tran_text: 找到在一樓的鞋店並進入。

orig_text: Park the car in one of the containers.
tran_text: 將車停在其中一個貨櫃裡。

orig_text: Wait for the blimp to arrive
The cops interrupted the hacking. Get it going again.
tran_text: 警察中斷了駭入。重新啟動它。

orig_text: Grab the soda from the vending machine and deliver it to the mechanic.
tran_text: 從自動售賣機中拿到蘇打，及給機械師。

orig_text: Collect more loot or take the bike
tran_text: 取得更多贓物或拿走摩托車

orig_text: Bag the money in the vault
The main server doors are now open, steal the hard drive!
tran_text: 主伺服器門開了，偷走硬盤！

orig_text: Throw the gold into the back of the van.
tran_text: 拋黃金到廂型車的後面。

orig_text: Stockholm Syndrome: Hostage trade already in progress
tran_text: 斯德哥爾摩症候群：人質交易已進行中

orig_text: Make your way back to the van. Remember, you can't afford to kill any more guards.
tran_text: 使用你的方法回到廂型車。記住，你不能再多殺一個警衛。

orig_text: Rig the detonator to the breaching charges and arm it.
tran_text: 連接引爆器和爆破炸藥然後守衛它。

orig_text: One of the specially marked Murkywater containers will be the one that holds our vault. Find it.
tran_text: 其中一個特別印有黑水的貨櫃裡會有我們要的金庫。找出它。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to screw the winch down
Find the safe with money in it
tran_text: 找到裝有現金的保險箱

orig_text: Carry the bags with coke from the roof and place it infront of the vault door
tran_text: 從屋頂運送裝有古柯鹼的包並放在金庫門的前面

orig_text: Hoxton got his nickname from being arrested in the district of Hoxton, Shoreditch, London.
tran_text: Hoxton got his nickname from being arrested in the district of Hoxton, Shoreditch, London.

orig_text: We have a bug planted in the yayo. Rip open all you find.
tran_text: 我們放了個裝置在古柯鹼內，打開所有找到的古柯鹼。

orig_text: Destroying a camera after you got detected won't stop the alarm.
tran_text: 要是你被監視鏡頭發現了，就算你即時把它拆了也阻止不了警報的。
重覆按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以威嚇條子。

orig_text: Check the picture Bain sent you and find out the exact location of this guest. He is a slot machine addict, so he will probably be playing.
tran_text: 檢查 Bain 給你的圖片找出這客人的準確位置。他是個老虎機​​狂魔，所以他應該在玩。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to start the fork lifter
Put the goats in the cage
$TEAMMATE; has been released from custody thanks to $HELPER;!
tran_text: $TEAMMATE; 在拘留中被 $HELPER; 救回來，感謝他！
你失敗了：所有精靈死亡

orig_text: You need to fill the water tank

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以存取支線任務

orig_text: The panic room has a retinal scanner on the door. Tie up the FBI boss and use him to open the door.
tran_text: 避難室有虹膜掃描器。綁住 FBI 老闆並逼他打開避難室的門。

orig_text: Hoxton spends a fortune on beer.
tran_text: Hoxton 把錢都花在啤酒上去了。

orig_text: Bring the missing server back to Hoxton so that he can continue looking for the information he needs.
tran_text: 將遺失的伺服器拿給 Hoxton ，這樣才能繼續搜尋他要的資料。

orig_text: Help the mechanic collect special parts
tran_text: 幫助機械師收集特定部件

orig_text: Someone saw suspicious activity and called the police
tran_text: 某人發現了異狀並打電話報警

orig_text: Find two more numbers for the armory code
tran_text: 找到軍械庫密碼剩下兩位

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the diamond briefcase
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拾取鑽石保險箱

orig_text: Two players doing the same interaction (eg. picking a lock) doesn't make the interaction go any faster.
tran_text: 諸是開鎖之類的互動只需要一人即可完成，就算同時有兩人以上一起進行，互動也不會變快點的。

orig_text: Bain has prepared a starter kit for you
tran_text: Bain 為你準備了新手裝備

orig_text: Get taxman out of the limo! Saw open the roof and get him out!
tran_text: 抓稅務員離開加長車！鋸開頂部以抓他出來！

orig_text: Bile will drop you a thermal drill.
tran_text: Bile 會丟給你一個熱能鑽。

orig_text: We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Twenty bags should do it. Same drop off point.
tran_text: 我們要帶回步哨塔和一些彈藥，20包就夠了。放在一樣的投包點。

orig_text: A helicopter will drop off the C4 needed to breach the construction site wall.
tran_text: 直升機會投下為爆破所需要的 C4 炸藥

orig_text: Get to the escape vehicle and get out of there!
tran_text: 離開那裡，快滾上撤離車輛！

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take The Dentist's loot
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿取 Dentist 的贓物

orig_text: Wait for the van to return
Hold out while Bain sends in some C4 via helicopter.
tran_text: 支撐住， Bain 在直昇機送 C4 來。

orig_text: Wait for Bile to drop the present
tran_text: 等待 Bile 丟下禮物

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take missing animal poster
tran_text: 緊按 $BTN_INTERACT; 以撕下失蹤動物的海報。

orig_text: Trade the hostage for your teammate.
tran_text: 為了你的隊友交易人質。

orig_text: Charon should be on the courtyard - look for a good vantage point.
tran_text: Charon 應該在庭院－找一個制高點。

orig_text: Take the cop hostage by intimidating him.
Plant the breaching charges on Black Ridge's blast door.
tran_text: 把爆破炸藥放置在黑脊的防爆門上。

orig_text: Hang around and gather more valuables or escape!
tran_text: 多待會繼續搜刮要不然就撤離！

orig_text: Use the phone to signal to make the bus drive through the wall.
tran_text: 用電話發出信號使公車衝破牆面

orig_text: Secure more diamond bags at Mr. Blonde's location or simply wait for the escape!
tran_text: 將更多鑽石袋子送到 Mr. Blonde 的位置，或是等待逃亡機會。

orig_text: Get to the marked man hole, and make your way down into the sewers.
tran_text: 去被標注的人孔蓋，在下水道找到出路。

orig_text: The Sharpshooter Skill Subtree specializes in sniping with a single accurate shot.
tran_text: 黑手技能樹的精準射手分枝是能令你成為開一槍殺一人的狙擊大師。

orig_text: The drill has jammed. Repair it.
Open the security room door with the keycard.
tran_text: 用鑰匙卡打開保安室的門。

orig_text: The Revenant Skill Subtree is all about survival during worst case scenarios.
tran_text: 逃犯技能樹的復仇者分枝的技能令你能在最惡劣的環境也能活下去。

orig_text: Open the skylight barrier by hacking the mechanism in the Security Center.
tran_text: 通過入侵安保中心的機器打開天窗柵欄。

orig_text: You can pick up ammo from dead law enforcers.
tran_text: 你可以從死亡的條子中獲得彈藥。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a broken window
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到碎掉的玻璃

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up Chavez' keys
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拾起 Chavez 的鎖匙
找出並分析 Hoxton 的證據

orig_text: Looks like we've cleaned the boat empty, time to escape.
tran_text: 看來我們清空這遊艇了，撤離時間。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to unpack the sentry gun
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 解包步哨機槍

orig_text: Find the exact address to the Commissar: search through the basement for clues, maps or whiteboards that give away hints and other useful information. Connect the information using the district name. Bain repeats the correct district name for you.
tran_text: 找出政委的準確地址：在地下室從線索、地圖或白板尋找任何提示和有用的資訊。將資訊與地名聯結。 Bain 會複述正確的地名。

orig_text: Civilians will not notice broken cameras or loot bags. However, they will notice Body Bags.
tran_text: 平民會對打壞的監視鏡頭和贓物包視若無睹，但是屍袋他們還是會注意到的。

orig_text: Keep looting the vault if you want, or make your escape.
tran_text: 繼續搜刮或者撤離這裡。
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 關閉鑽機老母

orig_text: Bring another engine to the helicopter to see if it's the right one
tran_text: 將另一台引擎丟進直升機來看看是否是正確的

orig_text: The detonator is vulnerable to interference. Prevent law enforcement from disabling it.
tran_text: 引爆器容易受到干擾。防止條子打斷它。

orig_text: Going for optional loot usually gives you more experience and money.
tran_text: 贓物多多益善，額外的贓物代表著更多的經驗值和錢。

orig_text: Defend the rest of the coke until the loot boat returns
tran_text: 在船回來前守護剩下的古柯鹼

orig_text: Right clicking whilst zoomed in with a Bow weapon will cancel your shot.
tran_text: 使用弓弩系武器時，瞄準時按右滑鼠鍵會即會取消射擊動作。

orig_text: Connect the mic recorder to the phone
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the winch to the BFD
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 將絞盤連接到鑽機老母上

orig_text: Signal the helicopter pilot with a flare
Use the server to get remote access to the computer containing the codes to unlock the security gate to the vault area.
tran_text: 用伺服器遙控擁有保安閘門密碼的電腦

orig_text: Do not try this in real life.
tran_text: 本遊戲純屬虛構，切勿以身試法。

orig_text: The Tin Boy toy is in one of the red gift boxes located inside the toy store. Go find it!
tran_text: 錫玩具就在商店中其中一個紅色禮物盒內，去找它！

orig_text: Dallas spends a fortune on nice suits.
tran_text: Dallas 把血汗錢都花在西裝上。

orig_text: Apply the drill to the safe and plug the power cord into an outlet. As soon as the drill is done, drag the water hose down to the basement and connect it.
tran_text: 放置鑽機到保險箱並接上電源。當電鑽完成工作，拉水管到地下室及連接到那洞。

orig_text: Enemy Snipers deal massive amount of damage that can wipe all of your armor and take a part of your health in one shot.
tran_text: 敵方狙擊手可以一槍打穿你最厚的護甲並重創你。

orig_text: While on Crime.net the more skulls the server or heist has under its name the higher the difficulty.
tran_text: Crime.net 的劫案名稱底下會有骷髏圖示，越多骷髏的劫案就越困難。

orig_text: Using info provided on the manifest, find the stashed away money bundles and secure them.
tran_text: 使用駭入資料以找到被收藏起來的錢包及獲得他們。

orig_text: Go through with the drug deal
The cops freed a civilian - control the civilians!
tran_text: 條子釋放了一個市民－控制那市民！

orig_text: Access the computer and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net.
tran_text: 使用電腦及刪去所有有關 Crime.Net 的資料。

orig_text: Cut the fence to gain entry into the compound.
tran_text: 剪開圍欄以獲得入口進入後院。

orig_text: Find something to bridge the gap
tran_text: 去找可以讓車在凹洞上通過的東西！

orig_text: Wait for Twitch to come and pick you up with the van.
tran_text: 等 Twitch 開車接妳走。

orig_text: Use the thermal drill to get into the vault.
Collect the tank and exhaust pipes
Wait until Charon finds a way up the building.
tran_text: 等待 Charon 找到方法上來。

orig_text: Follow the armored truck to where it stopped.
tran_text: 跟隨武裝卡車看它停在哪裡。

orig_text: Find the safe with money in it. Vlad said that the boss keeps it in his office.
tran_text: 找到裝有現金的保險箱， Vlad 說那個人放在他辦公室裡的某處。

orig_text: Push forward and reach the entrance of the Black Ridge facility.
tran_text: 推進然後到達黑脊設施的入口。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected suspicious activity
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到異常情況
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Sokol 對話

orig_text: Use the key to open the red door.
Screw the winch down to the floor!
tran_text: 把鉤繩鎖在地板上固定！

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected broken voting machines
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到損壞的投票機

orig_text: Use the exterior scaffolding to reach the second floor.
Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.
Get the C4 Bile supplied and use it to block the vault. You need two charges.
tran_text: 取得直升機帶來的 C4 並安在金庫上。你需要兩組。

orig_text: Secure the loot bags at the designated drop off location.
tran_text: 將贓物運到指定的投包點。

orig_text: Drill a hole and connect the hose to the safe
tran_text: 鑽出個洞並連上水管到保險箱

orig_text: The helicopter should arrive in a few moments. It carries a hose which needs to be connected with a wagon.
tran_text: 直升機隨時都會來。他會帶著一根水管，你需要將他與車廂連接。

orig_text: Find out where the server room is located and access it.
Wait until the helicopter fills the wagon with water
tran_text: 等待直升機將車廂灌滿水
裝有客人名單的隨身碟

orig_text: Passing blocking guards will blow your cover!
tran_text: 通過擋住的警衛會暴露你的身分！

orig_text: Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
tran_text: 鎖定降落在城裡某處的載錢貨盤。檢查樓頂和建築內。

orig_text: Gather Matt and the Gang under the Helicopter
tran_text: 強逼 Matt 上直昇機及保護他 ( 阿米蒂奇大道 )

orig_text: We have some information, but if you can handle it, we could use more. So scan more or grab the server and leave.
tran_text: 我們已有一些資料，但如果你能處理，我們應該使用更多資料。所以掃瞄更多或帶住伺服器離開。

orig_text: The Controller Skill Subtree is focused on capturing and controlling hostages. Including law enforcers.
tran_text: 黑手技能樹的控場手分枝都是專門捕捉及操控人質的技能，包括令警察投降甚至變節。

orig_text: Sydney spends a fortune on art materials.
tran_text: Sydney 把錢都花在美術用品的開銷上。

orig_text: In order to start filling up the wagon with water, you need to connect the hose with a wagon.
tran_text: 為了將車箱裝滿水，你需要將水管連接到車廂上。

orig_text: The bollards are blocking the truck. Open the doors inside the garage to find the control room, and lower the bollards.
tran_text: 護柱檔住了撤離車。打開車庫內的門以尋找控制室，然後解除護柱。

orig_text: Remove the moorings holding the boat in place and detach the hose from the boat.
tran_text: 把與船連接的綁繩跟油管拔掉。

orig_text: The lumber yard is a safe place where you can wait.
tran_text: 伐木場是一個安全的地方，你可以在那等直升機。

orig_text: Jimmy spends a fortune on cocaine.
tran_text: Jimmy 把錢都花在古柯鹼上。

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to fax scanned documents to Bain
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 發送掃描的文檔給 Bain

orig_text: Bain has something more in store for you in the alley
tran_text: Bain 在店的後巷為你準備了好東西

orig_text: You have been challenged to spin the wheel of misfortune. Do you dare!?
tran_text: 你要挑戰轉動惡運轉盤，你敢嗎！？

orig_text: Hack the computer to disable the lasers guarding the vault entrance.
tran_text: 駭入電腦關閉保護金庫大門的紅外

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a trip mine
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到詭雷

orig_text: Cops might try to cut the water supply. Make sure the water is flowing!
tran_text: 條子可能會截斷水源，確保水一直流動！

orig_text: Get inside the FBI safe house. Be aware of the alarm on all the doors and windows. Once a door or window is opened, you have a limited time to disable the alarm.
tran_text: 進入 FBI 安全屋。注意門上和窗戶上的警報系統。一旦門或窗戶被打開，你只有有線的時間解除警報。

orig_text: You guys remember that sketchy old warehouse on the docks? Where Murkywater were smuggling in loot? Well, we're headed back there.
tran_text: 你們還記得那個老舊的倉庫嗎？黑水傭兵曾經在那走私贓物。好吧，我們要回到那裏了。

orig_text: Get into the truck with the ballot machines

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以打開炸彈艙口

orig_text: Sydney's old street gang, the Dingos, are still operating back in Melbourne.
tran_text: Sydney 以前待過的街頭幫派 Dingos，現時依舊在澳洲墨爾本運作。

orig_text: Use gasoline to set the van on fire and force Matt out.
tran_text: 用汽油強逼 Matt 離開廂型車。

orig_text: Carry the prototype turret parts to the drop off
tran_text: 運送步哨塔原型部件到投包點

orig_text: Set-up all the devices at your station on the roof
Time to start over again, get to the exit and run down the hallway. Time is ticking!
tran_text: 該回到起點了，回到出口走到通到盡頭。快阿！時間還在流逝阿！

orig_text: Wait for the ship to move

tran_text: 允許 Hoxton 清除的要求

orig_text: Kill the guard and hide his body.

tran_text: 追到 Matt ！ ( 外國大道 )

orig_text: Pour out the thermite in the office above the vault - it will burn a hole through the steel floor. There are two cans of thermite hidden inside the copy machine, if both are carried to the vault it will speed up the melting process.
tran_text: 在金庫上的辦公室倒上鋁熱劑，那樣會在鐵製的隔層燒出一個洞。影印機那邊藏了兩罐鋁熱劑，如果把那兩罐帶過來一起燒會加速熔化過程。

orig_text: No suspicious actions allowed in civilian mode
tran_text: 市民模式中禁止一切可疑行為

orig_text: The cops have shut down the BFD. Get her re-started.
tran_text: 條子關閉了鑽機老母。重啟她。

orig_text: The Breacher Skill Subtree focuses on opening doors, safes, and vaults quickly. It also upgrades the Trip Mines.
tran_text: 技師技能樹的爆破手分枝集中於更快捷地破開門鎖及保險箱等等，以及詭雷的升級。

orig_text: Hack into a security panel on the side of the trains to open the main doors.
tran_text: 駭入火車上的保全面版以打開主要的門。

orig_text: Perk Decks can change the way you play drastically. Choose one that fits your playstyle.
tran_text: 技能牌組可以大幅改變你的行動方式。請從中選擇最切合你的玩法的牌組。

orig_text: In order for a plane to land on the road, you need to cut the surrounding trees down.
tran_text: 為了讓飛機降落，你需要砍倒周遭的樹。

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to hack the skylight barrier
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 解除天窗柵欄

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a criminal
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到罪犯

orig_text: Dallas doesn't like going to the dentist.

Wait for Taxman to show the server we are after. Scare him into the limo when you see it - we need both the server and the taxman. Alex will lift him up to us from the open street. Also, keep an eye out for what you can use to better your chances.
tran_text: 等待稅務員展示伺服器，當看到稅務員和伺服器時嚇他進加長車 -我們同時需要稅務員和伺服器。 Alex 將會吊他到我們的地方。注意身邊有甚麼可以幫你增加成功率。

orig_text: Find and grab the briefcase Charon mentioned.
tran_text: 找到及拿到 Charon 提到的公事包。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a sentry gun and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民注意到自動炮台並通報警察

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the muriatic acid
With all of the destruction, we will need an evac out of the city.
tran_text: 辦完事後，我們會需要後援逃出這座城市。

orig_text: Bring the server to the escape vehicle
tran_text: 將伺服器運到撤離車輛上

orig_text: The winch parts are coming by train; they will be there soon!
tran_text: 鉤繩零件將會利用火車送來 ; 快到了！

orig_text: Wait for the thermite to finish burning
Identification step 3/3: Access the bank managers computer to get hold of the vault codes.
tran_text: 鑑定階段 3/3 ：用銀行經理的電腦取得金庫密碼

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to hand over the tool
Wait for Hoxton to request security clearance for the files he needs.
tran_text: 等待 Hoxton 要求解鎖資料的保安權限。

orig_text: Take the medallion from the box inside the floor.
tran_text: 把在地板箱子裡的獎牌拿走。

orig_text: Find the manager's keycard. He's probably carrying it on him.
tran_text: 找到經理的鑰匙卡，卡可能在經理身上。

orig_text: Get back to the van undetected
tran_text: 不被發現下回到廂型車

orig_text: Make sure you pick up all of the cage parts in order to assemble the cage.
tran_text: 確保你拿到所有的籠子部件，你才能組裝它。

orig_text: Find the exit out of the sewers, look for the light!
tran_text: 在下水道找到出路，尋找光線！

orig_text: Disable the security to open up the shutters!
tran_text: 關閉防盜設施以打開鐵門！

orig_text: Hand over at least 1 bag of diamonds to Mr. Blonde. It is your decision if you want to secure more.
tran_text: 將最少１包鑽石交給 Mr. Blonde 保管。你可自行決定交出更多包鑽石。

orig_text: Get the loot to your escape vehicle and secure it.
tran_text: 將贓物運到撤離工具並獲得它

orig_text: Water pump nearby will easily fill the wagon. Connect the hose with pump first and then keep extending it until you reach the wagon!
tran_text: 附近的幫浦可以輕易地用水填滿車廂。先將水管接上幫浦，再延伸水管到車廂。

orig_text: Use thermite to melt through the sewer grating.
tran_text: 利用鋁熱劑將下水道的鐵柵欄融開。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected ECM feedback
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到干擾器反饋

orig_text: Find a computer connected to the internet. Plug in the memory stick and upload the guest list to Bain.
tran_text: 找台連接網絡的電腦。插入記憶棒然後上傳客人名單給 Bain 。

orig_text: Make sure nobody sees the computer.
Steal the truck and use it to retrieve the safes.
tran_text: 把可以裝保險箱的貨車偷出來

orig_text: Defend and cook meth or escape
tran_text: 防守並製作冰毒或離開

orig_text: Start the time lock to open the security gate
Connect the hose to the wagon
Put on your mask to break out of the shipping crates.
tran_text: 帶上面具突破船運木箱。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Blackmailer called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：敲詐者打電話報警

orig_text: We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Eight bags should do it. Same drop off point.
tran_text: 我們要帶回步哨塔和一些彈藥，8包就夠了。放在一樣的投包點。
使用 $BTN_USE_ITEM; 以放置醫療包。

orig_text: Put all the goats from the barn in the cage you assembled.
tran_text: 把所有從穀倉出來的羊趕進你組裝好的籠子裡.

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a drill
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到鑽頭

orig_text: Make sure SWAT doesn't stop the printer, and keep it full with ink and paper.
tran_text: 確保條子不會弄停影印機及充滿墨水和紙張。

orig_text: Hit Santa to wake him up!
You are in casing mode. Mask on to start the heist.
tran_text: 你正在踩點模式，戴上面具開始搶劫。

orig_text: The escape is now available. The helicopter is waiting for you. You can leave or stay for more loot.
tran_text: 現在可以撤離了，直升機在等著你。你可以撤離或留下來搜刮更多的贓物。

orig_text: Take care of the lasers and carry the gold to the insertion point
tran_text: 處理雷射並運送黃金到投包點

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the bike part
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以取得摩托車部件

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to add the saw blade
Use the passwords Charon gave you and hack into the manifest.
tran_text: 使用 Charon 給你的密碼以駭入。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Too many innocent casualities
tran_text: 觸發警報： 太多無謂的傷亡

orig_text: Find the system access point so Bain can hack into it and unlock the security door.
tran_text: 找到系統的存取點讓 Bain 可以駭入門鎖系統。

orig_text: Set up the zip-line on the roof and get up to the crane.
tran_text: 在屋頂上架設滑索並爬上起重機
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以打開古柯鹼

orig_text: Now that you have all EMP parts, you can escape or secure more loot.
tran_text: 現在你已擁有所有 EMP 部件，你可以撤離或奪取更多贓物。

orig_text: Locate and access the server room
The pick-up is slowly opening the hatch. Make sure the cops don't interrupt the motor!
tran_text: 車子正緩慢打開艙門。確保警察不會關閉引擎！

orig_text: You've been made! Burn the truck and get out of there
tran_text: 你被抓包了！燒掉卡車然後離開這裡

orig_text: We need to find who is staying in that guest room. Download the guest list onto the memory stick. You can acquire this list from a terminal in casino reception.
tran_text: 我們需要知道誰在客房。下載客人名單拷貝進記憶棒。你可以在賭場接待處那裡的終端獲得這名單。
你找到一個很可疑的包裹

orig_text: All elves are dead! Time to leave!
tran_text: 所有精靈都死了！是時候撤離！

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to drop the C4 on the roof.
tran_text: 等待直昇機投下 C4 到天台。

orig_text: Take planks and use them to barricade windows, vents and fences
tran_text: 拿起木板並用它封住窗戶、通風口及籬笆

orig_text: Generator stopped due to loss of pressure, get there and restart it!
tran_text: 發電機因為失壓而停止，到那裡重新啟動它！

orig_text: Use $BTN_INTERACT; to shout at civilians and keep them in check.
tran_text: 使用 $BTN_INTERACT; 以喊叫市民以令他們恐懼。
你的反間威脅被抵抗了

orig_text: Connect the fuel hose to the ship
Help your downed teammate back up.
tran_text: 幫助已倒下的隊友起來。

orig_text: Take the bomb parts from the containers and take them to the helicopter.
tran_text: 從貨櫃將炸彈部件運到直升機。

orig_text: Talk to Mitchell. See if you can get down to the basement without necessary hustle.
tran_text: 與 Mitchell 說話。看看你能不能在不引發騷亂下到達地下室。

orig_text: Wait for the magnet to be lowered
Take the bomb parts to the van
tran_text: 將炸彈部件運到廂型車

orig_text: Carry the server to the van
Hack the FBI Director's computer in order to give Hoxton access to the secure files he needs.
tran_text: 駭入 FBI 局長的電腦，讓 Hoxton 可以得到他要的保安資料。

orig_text: Pick up the loot and take it to the escape.
tran_text: 拿起贓物，帶著它撤離吧。

orig_text: Go to the money pallet and attach it to the helicopter.
tran_text: 把載錢貨盤與直升機連接。
將核彈頭運送到火車那裡
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以開啟充電炸彈
正在放置全球定位追蹤器

orig_text: Escape is now available. You can leave or stay for more loot.
tran_text: 現在可以撤離了。你可以撤離或留下來搜刮更多的贓物。

orig_text: Get the USB stick from the head of security
tran_text: 在警衛總管中拿到隨身碟

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to pick you up.
The Sosas have a hidden safe under the floor of the office. You want to open that safe. Hook the winches up, one on each side.
tran_text: Sosas 在地下有一個隱藏保險箱，你想打開，鉤住絞盤，每邊一個。

orig_text: Use the control panel to select a vault to unlock first.
tran_text: 使用控制面板先選一個金庫來解鎖。

orig_text: Listen to the directions given by the stage manager. Press the buttons when he says and put on a good show!
tran_text: 聽從舞台監督的指示。在他說按按鈕時就按下去，演出一場好秀！

orig_text: Wait until Bain find a way out of there.
tran_text: 等等 Bain 找到方法出來。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw suspicious activity and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現異常情況並通報警察

orig_text: Rotate the crane over the bank to drop the piggy bank.
tran_text: 為了放下小豬撲滿，旋轉起重機。

orig_text: We have all the information we need, grab the server and let's go!
tran_text: 我們已有所有我們需要的資料，帶起伺服器就走！

orig_text: Burn a hole into the wagon
Return to the Operations Room to continue defending Hoxton.
Using the laptop, hack open the server room doors
tran_text: 使用筆記本電腦以駭入打開伺服器門口

orig_text: You already have the max amount of body bags.
tran_text: 你能攜帶的屍袋已達上限。

orig_text: Carry the loot to the van
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the cable to the power socket
Follow Mr. Blonde into the store and get ready to start the job.
tran_text: 跟隨 Mr. Blonde 進店內並準備動手打劫

orig_text: Use the saw to cut a hole at the weak spot of the floor!
tran_text: 利用電鋸鋸開地板較脆弱地方！

orig_text: Locate Chavez - he is on one of the upper floors in the building, wearing a red beanie hat. Take the key from him.
tran_text: 找到 Chavez － 他在這建築的上層位置，他戴住紅色針織帽，在他身上拿到鎖匙。

orig_text: Lower the road barriers from the truck's path.
tran_text: 解除撤離車路徑上的路障

orig_text: Toss the presents down the chimney outside of the warehouse.
tran_text: 把禮物扔到倉庫外的煙囪裡。

orig_text: The wheel is broken, you need to restart it!
tran_text: 轉盤壞了，你需要重新開啟！

orig_text: Secure the EMP parts at the escape area.
tran_text: 在撤離處奪取 EMP 部件。

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter to return
Everyone must stand in the circle by the safe. Don't leave until the timer is finished!
tran_text: 每個人都必須站在以保險箱為圓心的圓圈內。保險箱時間倒數完之前不要離開！

orig_text: Now that you've found the vans, it's time to break into them and grab those safes.
tran_text: 找到貨車了，該弄開車箱把保險箱拿出來了。

orig_text: Hold out until the helicopter arrives
tran_text: 在直升機來之前撐下來

orig_text: Release the piggybank from the crane.
tran_text: 從起重機釋放小豬撲滿。

orig_text: Grab the chest and get it back to the secure drop-off point.
tran_text: 拿上匣子把它安全運到接應點。

orig_text: The Elephant sends his regards and left a little gift for you. Make sure you pick it up before you leave - because you are worth it.
tran_text: Elephant 要我代他向你們表示感謝，他還留了一點小禮物給你們，走之前記得帶上，因為你們值得。

orig_text: Go to the marked escape vehicle and get out of there.
tran_text: 去標示了的撤離車以撤離。

orig_text: Sometimes you need to take things to the extreme to earn a good payday, and that's exactly what we're doing this time. Enter the building, find the panic room, and then steal the whole god damn room by using a helicopter.$NL;$NL;» Enter the building$NL;» Locate and dismount the panic room$NL;» Lift out the panic room and escape
tran_text: 進入這建築及找到 ... 「戰慄空間」.$NL;$NL;» 進入建築$NL;» 找到及卸下安全室$NL;» 送走安全室及逃跑

orig_text: Your blood sample was destroyed! Get a new one!
tran_text: 你的血液樣本被破壞！去拿新的回來！

orig_text: Find three numbers for the armory code
Get remote access to the computer
Attach the C4 to the safe
tran_text: 連接 C4 到保險箱

orig_text: Charon is hurt. Help him back to the Escape zone.
tran_text: Charon 受傷了，帶他回去撤離點。

orig_text: Get downstairs to the basement and escape through the sewers.
tran_text: 進入下層的地庫以從下水道撤離。

orig_text: Make sure to reconnect the device

tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 重設爆破裝置

orig_text: The drink is now poisoned. Wait for chemistry and biology to do their work. When he runs for the bathroom, follow him. Deal with him in a remote spot.
tran_text: 飲料已下毒。現在是等待生化物質幹活的時間。當他跑去廁所，跟著他。在偏僻的地方解決他。

orig_text: Input the vault codes and open the vault.
Grab the C4 from the bag in the armory cage.
tran_text: 從軍火庫籠裡拿起 C4 。

orig_text: Make sure you get the saw started
Make your way to the house
The escape helicopter should arrive in a couple of minutes. Dig in and stay alive until then!
tran_text: 撤離直升機會在數分鐘內到達。努力活到那時吧！

orig_text: Search the motel and kill the Commissar's men.
tran_text: 搜索旅館並殺死政委的人馬。

orig_text: Wait for the chopper to arrive with the C4 and drop it for you. This will take some time.
tran_text: 等待直升機與 C4 到達，並丟包給你。這會花費一點時間。
你把 $TEAMMATE;從警方手中救出來了！

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to start hacking the skylight control panel
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 入侵天窗控制面板

orig_text: This is a short demo version of the Golden Grin Casino Heist made exclusively for E3.
tran_text:
這是為了E3展而做的預覽版本。 

 大銀行搶案將會在六月十七釋出。

orig_text: Let Chavez buzz you in, and then enter the building through the back door.
tran_text: 等 Chavez 叫你入去，然後從後門進入建築。

orig_text: You can select the ammo bag in your inventory and press $BTN_USE_ITEM; to place it.
tran_text: 你可以帶著彈藥包再按住 $BTN_USE_ITEM; 來擺置。

orig_text: Look for clues and tag the correct truck
tran_text: 找尋線索並標記正確車輛
你的手銬已被 $HELPER; 解除！

orig_text: The cops stoped the time lock. Use the keypad to start it again.
tran_text: 條子把時間鎖停了。再用密碼開一次

orig_text: Wait for Bile to come and pick the car up with his helicopter.
tran_text: 等待 Bile 來到及用直昇機吸走車。

orig_text: You can select the ammo bag in your inventory and press $BTN_USE_ITEM; to place it.
tran_text: 你可以在物品庫中選擇彈藥包及按下 $BTN_USE_ITEM; 去放下它。

orig_text: Once hacked in, Bain will sync the C4 with the concert pyrotechnics.
tran_text: 一旦駭入了，Bain 會讓 C4 爆炸與煙火特效同步。

orig_text: We are locked out of Ernesto Sosa's room. Wait for Bain to come up with a plan
tran_text: 我們被鎖在 Ernesto Sosa 的房間外面，等待 Bain 想到計劃。

orig_text: Secure all of the money in the vault
tran_text: 帶走所有在金庫裡的錢

orig_text: Find a gas can and put it in the trap container.
tran_text: 找到汽油並倒入陷阱集裝箱。

orig_text: Open up the Gensec truck and steal the paintings
You are in civilian mode. Find your gear.
tran_text: 你在市民模式。找到你的裝備。

orig_text: Enter the main area of the docks.
Find out which is the right one by looking for clues
tran_text: 靠著線索去找哪個是正確的

orig_text: Without getting noticed, set-up the hacking devices and hack the machines
tran_text: 設置駭取設備駭進機器且不被發現

orig_text: Get into the democrat's office and access his stationary computer
tran_text: 進入民主黨議員的辦公室並侵入他的電腦

orig_text: Hack the security system in order to get access to Rossy's Lab
tran_text: 駭入保安系統來進入Rossy的實驗室

orig_text: Grant access from the security consoles
tran_text: 使用保安控制板取得許可

orig_text: Escort the mechanic to his truck so he can start assembling the bike
tran_text: 護送機械師到他的卡車，讓他可以開始組裝摩托車

orig_text: The saw has stopped. Restart it!
tran_text: 電鋸停止運作了。重新啟動它！

orig_text: The winch has stopped. Restart it!
tran_text: 鉤繩停下來了。重新啟動它！

orig_text: Light the flare to signal to the chopper pilot where you want him to drop the C4
tran_text: 點燃信號彈向直升機指示 C4 丟包點

orig_text: The convoy is on the way. Get in position!
Attach the cars to the helicopter's magnet so that Bile can lift them up.
tran_text: 連接車到直昇機的磁石以讓 Bile 可以吸起它們。

orig_text: Put a gas can on the pile of paintings and burn them all.
tran_text: 放汽油罐到一堆畫上面然後燒光它們。

orig_text: Head towards the white light at the end of the bridge!
tran_text: 前進直到到達橋尾的白光！

orig_text: Find the Operations Room where the main FBI intelligence servers are kept.
tran_text: 尋找 FBI 存放資料的控制室。

orig_text: Clear a path for the truck
Hoxton needs access to the main FBI intelligence servers in the Operations Room. The servers have the information that you need.
tran_text: Hoxton 需要進入存有 FBI 資料伺服器的控制室。伺服器上有你們所需要的資料。

orig_text: Wait for the panic room to unlock.
Open the Panic Room using the Thermal Lance in order to reach the traitor who's inside.
tran_text: 用熱能鑽頭來打開避難室看看誰是哪個叛徒在裡面。

orig_text: Hoxton needs encryption keys to access the next server. They can be found in the Security Office.
tran_text: Hoxton 需要解密金鑰才能進入下一個伺服器。金鑰能在保安辦公室找到。

orig_text: Search the Archive for Hoxton's case file.
tran_text: 在資料室找出 Hoxton 的訴訟文件。

orig_text: Locate the missing server in the IT Department
Press the start button to begin the Safe Event.
tran_text: 按下開始按鈕開始保險箱事件

orig_text: Get to the Black Ridge facility
Step inside the airlock. It leads to the inner complex.
tran_text: 進入氣閘艙。它通往核心區域。

orig_text: Fight your way to the overhead control room.
tran_text: 殺出一條進入上面控制室的路。

orig_text: Get in the helicopter and prepare for take off!
Everything and everyone will be leaving through the cargo hold. Open the doors!
tran_text: 所有東西所有人都會離開貨艙。打開門！

orig_text: Use the cargo controls to release the money pallets.
tran_text: 使用貨艙操縱台釋放載錢貨盤。

orig_text: Throw the bags at the indicated spot in the Gambling Hall to assemble the winch.
tran_text: 把包扔放在賭場大廳指定的位置上來組裝絞盤。

orig_text: The winch needs to be secure. Screw it down to the floor.
tran_text: 絞盤需要固定。把它固定在地板上。

orig_text: The blimp carrying the drill is en-route. Wait for it.
tran_text: 裝有鑽機的飛艇在路上了。稍候。

orig_text: The winch will move the BFD into the correct position. Start it up.
tran_text: 絞盤會將鑽機老母運送到正確的位置上去。啟動它。

orig_text: The loot is secure. Now escape the Golden Grin casino.
tran_text: 贓物安全運達。現在撤離金牙大賭場。

orig_text: Your gear will trigger metal detectors and set off the alarm. Your mask and guns have been stashed in a guitar case by Micho, the janitor. Find it. Grab the sleeping gas and poison too.
tran_text: 你的裝備會觸發金屬探測器並且拉響警報。你的面具和武器被清潔工 Micho 藏進一個吉他箱中。找到它。也拿上睡眠瓦斯和毒藥。

orig_text: Find two more numbers for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
tran_text: 找到剩下兩位金庫通行密碼。一個經理知道，一個賭場老闆知道剩下的前面安保知道。

orig_text: The guest's bottle is empty. Bring him a fresh one, spiked with the poison. Look for the bottles in the casino's bars and put poison in it. Remember to get the drink he likes.
tran_text: 客人的瓶子空了。給他帶個一支新的，下了毒的酒。在賭場吧台找到瓶子下毒。記住找他喜歡的飲料。

orig_text: Get into the lumber yard where the EMP has been dropped.
tran_text: 進入木材廠內投放了 EMP 的地方。

orig_text: Bring the server and the briefcase to the plane
tran_text: 帶住伺服器及公文包去飛機。

orig_text: Using Bain's Brain, Taxman's insider knowledge and the team's charms - get the IRS data base hacked for a huge tax cut.
tran_text: 依靠 Bain 的頭腦、稅務局內應的知識以及團隊的魅力 - 駭入稅務局的資料庫及獲得大量的稅務減免。

orig_text: Get back to the DeLorean, and hit the Commissar at his hideout.
tran_text: 回到 DeLorean ，到政委藏身處突擊他。

orig_text: Wait for Bain to trace the Commissar's call
tran_text: 等待 Bain 追蹤政委的電話

orig_text: Pick up the thermal drill and place it onto the vault
tran_text: 撿起鑽機並將它架設在金庫門上

orig_text: Locate some gas cans. Chances are they are around the gas station.
tran_text: 找出汽油桶。他們有可能在加油站周圍。

orig_text: Collect C4 from the car and plant it on the pumps at the gas station.
tran_text: 在車上搜集 C4 ，將它裝在加油機台上。

orig_text: Scout the bottom motel rooms for an entrance to the basement.
tran_text: 在汽車旅館一樓探查進入地下室的入口。

orig_text: Locate and enter the jewelry store on the first floor.
tran_text: 找到在一樓的珠寶店並進入。

orig_text: Use the computer to hack the keypad to disable the bulletproof glass display case.
tran_text: 使用電腦駭入鍵盤鎖以關掉防彈玻璃櫃。

orig_text: Plant all the C4 around the glass dome so you can blow it away!
tran_text: 放置所有 C4 在圓頂附近以讓你炸走它！

orig_text: Access the storage area behind the shoe store!
The first step to the meth cooking process is to add ephedrine pills. Find some and put it in the marked container.
tran_text: 制毒第一個步驟是加點麻黃鹼藥片. 找些來並放到標記的容器裡.

orig_text: Follow Bain's instruction on what ingredient to add next and cook a batch of meth.
tran_text: 遵循 Bain 的指示依次加入原料然後製作一堆毒品.

orig_text: Gather up and escape with the helicopter.
Quick! Defuse the C4 strapped to the walls!
tran_text: 快！拆掉在牆壁上的 C4 ！

orig_text: Escape with the plates or use them to print money.
tran_text: 帶住印刷版撤離或使用印刷版來印金錢。

orig_text: Get access to the secret criminal enterprise under Mitchell's pool.
tran_text: 獲得權限進入位於 Mitchell 水池下的秘密犯罪企業。

orig_text: Escape in the truck, but you must need your car.
tran_text: 讓卡車撤離, 但你必須用你的車.

orig_text: Defend yourself from the gang members. Use wood to board the windows.
tran_text: 從黑幫成員之下守護你自己. 使用板條封鎖窗戶.

orig_text: Don't let the cops take the goats from your cage.
tran_text: 別讓條子從你的籠子裡拿走山羊.

orig_text: Drive over the bridge to reach the escape truck.
Get the bags into the drop-off zone.
You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.
tran_text: 你們還記得在鄉下樹林的那間破房子，就是那個 Hector 的人做冰毒的地方？  好吧，我們回來這了。

orig_text: You need two keycards. Look out for a security area or other important areas such as office desks. Use one on the control panel to get the green light to use the second keycard by the panel down by the big gates. Timing is the key!
tran_text: 你們需要兩張密碼卡，多半放在安檢區或其他重要地方的辦公桌上。一張用在控制台上，然後另一張用在下面的金庫大門上。記緊兩者不能相隔太久！

orig_text: Our Insider will lead you to the second floor.
tran_text: 我們的內應會帶領你們上二樓。

orig_text: Pick up your gear from the server room
tran_text: 在伺服室拾取所需物資

orig_text: The alarm has activated a second feature on the gate. Locate the hacked computer in the managment area and use it to release the magnetic lock.
tran_text: 大門的第二區連結著警報器。找到被入侵的電腦，並且用來解除磁性鎖。

orig_text: Use C4 on the vault door
Make sure Mr. Pink makes it back to the rendezvous point.
tran_text: 確保 Mr. Pink 能回到會合點。

orig_text: Wait for Twitch to arrive with the getaway van!
tran_text: 等待接頭人駕著逃亡車輛前來！

orig_text: Search the forest for any loot
tran_text: 尋找森林裡的任何贓物

orig_text: Wait for the helicopter and find loot
tran_text: 邊找贓物邊等待直升機

orig_text: Signal the helicopter with a flare
tran_text: 用信號彈給直升機信號

orig_text: Kill the guard and answer his pager.
tran_text: 殺死警衛並回答無線電。

orig_text: Get their bodies out of sight.
tran_text: 將他們的屍體移到沒人看到的地方。

orig_text: Retrieve the encrypted flash drive containing the access codes from the laptop in the office.
tran_text: 取得已被加密的隨身碟，當中擁有存取代碼以供辦公室的筆記本電話使用。

orig_text: Steal the gold to make it look like a robbery.
tran_text: 偷走黃金以令這事件看起來像搶劫。

orig_text: Disable the camera watching the door.
tran_text: 阻止看門的攝像頭看到你。

orig_text: Find the laptop located on the second floor.
tran_text: 在二樓尋找筆記本電腦。

orig_text: Get to where the laptop is located.
tran_text: 到達筆記本電腦的位置。

orig_text: Sneak past the cameras and look for the keycard.
tran_text: 潛過攝像頭及尋找鑰匙卡。

orig_text: Enter the nightclub to steal the cocaine.
tran_text: 進入夜總會以偷取古柯鹼。

orig_text: Secure the cocaine in the escape van.
Put a doctor bag on the ground and heal yourself.
tran_text: 放置醫療包在地上並醫療自己。

orig_text: Wait for the vault to overheat
Help Charon kill all the gangsters on the courtyard.
tran_text: 幫忙 Charon 殺死所有在庭院內的暴徒。

orig_text: Move through the roof and access the new building.
tran_text: 穿過天台以進入新建築。

orig_text: More gangsters in this area clear them out.
tran_text: 有更多暴徒來了，清空區域。

orig_text: Place down a drill and get that gate open.
Make it back to the previous courtyard and wait for Bain's instructions
tran_text: 回去剛才的庭院及等待 Bain 的指示

orig_text: Wait by the elevator for the VIP
Make sure Charon makes it to the escape van.
tran_text: 確保 Charon 到達撤離車。

orig_text: Escort Charon to the Escape Van
tran_text: 護送 Charon 到撤離車

orig_text: Locke seemed to have sold out the butcher as well. Free her men so we can get a ride with that ship.
tran_text: Locke 看來還出賣了屠夫，救出他的人以讓我們可以坐船走。

orig_text: Wait for the captain to get to the boat
The ship needs more fuel for it to reach international waters. Drag a hose from the tank to the ship so we can start pumping fuel in to it.
tran_text: 船需要更加多油才能開到國際海域，從儲油桶拉水管到船上以加油。

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian pressed the alarm button
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民按下了警報按鈕
觸發警報：碎掉的玻璃導致警報
沒有有效平面放置腳架

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected breaking and entering
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到非法闖入

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hostage
tran_text: 觸發警報：攝影機偵測到人質

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a body bag and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現屍袋並通報警察

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a criminal and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民發現罪犯並通報警察

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian was affected by ECM feedback and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民受到干擾器反饋的影響並通報警察

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Civilian heard a window break and called the police
tran_text: 觸發警報：市民聽見玻璃被打破並通報警察

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected an explosion
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到爆炸

orig_text: Alarm tripped: Police detected a hostage
tran_text: 觸發警報：警察偵測到人質

orig_text: Crouching allows you to sneak more effectively
tran_text: 蹲下可以讓你更不容易被發現

orig_text: You are not long for this world!
tran_text: 你已經不屬於這個世界！

orig_text: You do not have enough ammo
Phone line is jammed by an ECM
tran_text: 電話線被電子干擾器 (ECM) 干擾

orig_text: Use W, A, S, D to move around
tran_text: 用 W， A， S， D 來移動

orig_text: You need to carry a bag to attach it
tran_text: 你需要攜帶包包才能把它掛上去

orig_text: Infiltrate the compound and destroy the weapons
Destroy 8 bags of weapons stashed inside the gangster hideout
tran_text: 摧毀8包堆在幫派藏身點的武器

orig_text: Find a saw blade and attach it to the saw to continue destroying weapons
tran_text: 找到鋸片然後裝到電鋸上繼續摧毀武器

orig_text: Search and find the server room, look for Gensec signs
tran_text: 搜尋並找到帶有Gensec標誌的伺服器房

orig_text: Set-up the thermal drill in order to access the vault
tran_text: 架設熱能鑽機進入金庫

orig_text: The vault is electrified! Turn off the power in order to set up the drill
tran_text: 金庫門上有通電！關掉電源以架設鑽機

orig_text: Stay frosty and survive until the helicopter arrives
tran_text: 保持警戒，在直升機來之前活下來。

orig_text: Stay alive until the loot boat arrives
Stay alive until the loot boat returns
Find a way out and secure the diamond.
tran_text: 找一條出去的路，並帶走鑽石

orig_text: Wait for the time lock to finish.
Get inside the chamber of the Diamond
It is time to shine - steal the Diamond.
tran_text: 閃亮時刻到了 - 偷走鑽石。

orig_text: Stay away from the gas and wait so it can dissipate.
tran_text: 離毒氣遠一點並等他消散

orig_text: Find the security room somewhere in the museum.
tran_text: 尋找博物館中的保安室

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn on the TV
You can only hack one computer at a time

Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the keycard

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place the hard drive
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to hand over diamond briefcase
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 以給予鑽石保險箱
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 移除警用胎刺

Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the hotel room keycard

Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take Beast spare parts
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿走「野獸」備用零件
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以拿起印刷版
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿走醫療用品

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Butler 對話
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Hila 對話
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Houston 對話
