按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以跟 Scarface 對話
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Rust 對話
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 跟 Wolf 對話

orig_text: You need a keycard to open the vault
tran_text: 你需要鑰匙卡打開金庫

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pass the files under the door
tran_text: 按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 將資料傳過門縫
輸入新的全球定位座標

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to open the elevator door
Get the loot into the escape van up on the street
tran_text: 將贓物帶到街上的撤離廂型車

orig_text: Get the loot to the van

tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以賭 $10,000 是紅色
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以播放錄音帶
按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以重設傷害計算器

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to start the time trial
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 以重新開始時間測試

orig_text: Look for the keycards, you need two of them to get that vault open, remember to check the tellers.
tran_text: 尋找鑰匙卡，你需要兩張來開金庫，記得檢查櫃台。

orig_text: Wait for the plane to drop the bags with the cage parts.
tran_text: 等待飛機丟下籠子零件

orig_text: Carry the cage part bags to the marked out spot and assemble the cage.
tran_text: 運送籠子部件道被標注的地點並組裝它。

orig_text: Give a bag to the blackmailer
Wait for the timelock to open the vault. Keep an eye out on the timer.
tran_text: 等待時間鎖打開前往金庫的大門時，顧好那個時間鎖。

orig_text: Open up deposit boxes inside the vault, and look for the money. One bag is required from your contact, the rest is gravy.
tran_text: 打開金庫裡的保險櫃。並找到錢。合約需要一袋錢，其餘的錢就當做是賺外快。

orig_text: Your driver had to bail. He left behind a drill. Get it.
tran_text: 你的駕駛得跑了，但他丟了個熱能鑽，去撿起來

orig_text: Interact with the cage to send up the balloon and wait for the plane to pick it up.
tran_text: 與籠子互動釋放氣球，等待飛機取走籠子。

orig_text: Raise the balloon and wait for the plane
Enter the Bodhi's dry cleaning establishment
Make yourself feel at home and wait for Bain to call you
tran_text: 把這裡當自己家，等 Bain 打電話給你

orig_text: Wait for Bain to call you
Throw the bag on the table
Give lady Justice what she deserves and enter the basement
tran_text: 給正義女神它應得的並前往地下室
按住 $BTN_INTERACT; 啟動鑽機老母

orig_text: Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the elevator key
tran_text: 按下 $BTN_INTERACT; 拿起電梯鑰匙

orig_text: Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the water tank
Can't enter the vehicle while carrying loot
tran_text: 背著贓物時無法進入車輛

orig_text: Use the thermal drill to get access to the vault
Secure the money by throwing it into the van
tran_text: 將錢丟進廂型車來獲得它

orig_text: Secure the gold by throwing it into the van
tran_text: 將黃金丟進廂型車來獲得它

orig_text: The ride is on its way, keep tight
Find a way into the Shield mall
Get back to the van you came with
tran_text: 回到你過來時的廂型車

orig_text: Get down in the garage and escape
The van got trashed, so wait for the helicopter to arrive
tran_text: 車報銷了，乖乖等直升機來載你吧

orig_text: Get into the office overlooking the club and find the safe
tran_text: 進入俯瞰夜店的辦公室並找出保險箱

orig_text: Open the safe that the boss keeps his cash in!
tran_text: 把那老闆藏錢的保險箱打開！

orig_text: Move all the cash to the van
There's got to be a keycard somewhere
tran_text: 這附近應該會有鑰匙卡

orig_text: Find your way to the tiara and steal it for Vlad
tran_text: 想辦法找到皇冠並幫 Vlad 偷走它

orig_text: The escape van is coming soon, so get ready
Steal the jewelry in the jewelry store
While extra loot is nice, we need to take his money. Find the safe with the money in it. Its gotta be somewhere!
tran_text: 雖然額外的贓物很棒，但是我們需要它的錢。找出有裝錢的保險箱。它一定在某個地方！

orig_text: You will be in spectate mode until
tran_text: 你將會是觀察者模式直到

orig_text: Listen to the Contract Broker - he will tell you what to do next.
tran_text: 請仔細聽取合約中介人的訊息－－他會告訴你下一步該怎麼辦。

orig_text: The damage of every arrow shot from a Bow will increase depending on how long you charged the shot.
tran_text: 弓箭的傷害視乎你拉弓儲力的時間，儲力越久，傷害越高。

orig_text: Flashbangs can be destroyed after landing on the ground by shooting at them, or even by attacking them with a Melee weapon.
tran_text: 閃光彈被投擲落地時，你可以射擊它來以防止引爆－－你甚至可以用近戰攻擊來摧毀它

orig_text: ECM Jammers will temporarily convert SWAT Van Turrets to your side.
tran_text: ECM干擾器可以令SWAT裝甲車上的炮台暫時「變節」一段時間。

orig_text: A low Detection Rate can be used in a gunfight with the Ghost Skill Tree. Just because someone's not wearing armor, doesn't mean they can't hold their own in a fight.
tran_text: 壓得夠低的暴露值配合「鬼魅」技能樹可以在槍戰上發揮作用。不穿厚重護甲的人，不代表他們在火併時無能。

orig_text: The SWAT Van Turret's weakness is the reflective camera below the gun. Aim at it for maximum damage output.
tran_text: SWAT裝甲車炮台的弱點位於槍管下的反射鏡頭，想快速摧毀它就請瞄準該處射擊。

orig_text: Most windows can be picked open. Breaking them will make lots of noise, and even civilians will be suspicious if they see broken glass.
tran_text: 大部分的玻璃窗都可以撬開。要是打破它們就會製造聲響引人注意，破爛的窗戶亦會引起平民懷疑。

orig_text: If you break a window, try to find planks to cover it with, to fool any passing guards and civilians.
tran_text: 要是你弄破了玻璃窗，嘗試去找些木板條去封起來，這方法可以騙過路過的守衛和平民。

orig_text: Know your enemy. Cloakers have distinct green, glowing night vision goggles on, and make a noise when they're charging at you. You can also hear a static noise when they arrive at the scene.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。Cloakers 戴著一副亮著綠色光芒的夜視鏡，他們衝向你時會發出獨特的鬼叫。當他們潛伏在你附近時，你會聽到電波干擾的噪音。

orig_text: ECM Jammers temporarily disable cameras. Don't be afraid to use one to blind the Camera Operator when you're in a tight spot.
tran_text: ECM干擾器可令監視鏡頭暫時失效。有需要時不妨用來瞞過監視人員的法眼。

orig_text: If a camera sees suspicious activity, there's no stopping the alarm.
tran_text: 一旦被監視鏡頭發現可疑活動，就沒有任何方法能阻止警報響起了。

orig_text: Melee weapons are always silent. If you don't have a suppressor, this is your best friend for silent takedowns.
tran_text: 所有近戰武器都是靜音的。如果你剛好帶的槍都沒裝消音器，這是你要安靜放倒人時的最佳選擇。

orig_text: Guards will be able to tell you're behind them if you get too close. Keep some distance when you're tailing them.
tran_text: 要是你太接近警衛的話，他會有機會察覺到背後有人的。切勿跟車太貼，易生意外。

orig_text: Most guns reload faster when you have bullets left in the clip.
tran_text: 大部分的槍械在彈匣還有餘彈時，重新上彈的速度會較快。

orig_text: Purchasing Assets in the Loadout or Preplanning screen can be a great help during the heist. Study them closely.
tran_text: 在裝備配置或計劃畫面當中購入適當的輔助條件，可以為劫案帶來莫大助益。請慎重考慮。

orig_text: Know your enemy. The Medic wears bright red clothes and can quickly be identified in a crowd.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。Medic 身穿紅得發亮的衣服，你很容易就能從一大堆警察當中辨出他們。

orig_text: When one of your teammates has been downed, ask the rest of your team to cover you while you revive him.
tran_text: 當你有隊友受重傷倒地時，記緊叫你的隊友替你開火作掩護才好跑去救人。

orig_text: While sawing doors and deposit boxes is the fastest way to open them - it's also very loud. Use the silent motor to reduce its noise.
tran_text: 雖然打開門和保險箱的最快方法是用電鋸，但也是最吵的方法－－使用靜音馬達可有效減輕噪音音量。

orig_text: Hostages are your lifelines. Keep them secured, away from the action, and away from cops.
tran_text: 人質就是你們的生命線。確保他們安全，遠離一切危險，以及警察。

orig_text: Trip mines can be placed anywhere, such as vents where Cloakers spawns, or a room you don't want cops to enter.
tran_text: 詭雷可以裝設於任何地方，諸如 Cloakers 常常出現的通風口，或是你不想警察跑進去的房間內。

orig_text: Every Civilian you kill extends the amount of time you spend in jail while Bain works on trying to get you out.
tran_text: 你每殺死一個平民，Bain 就要花費更多時間去跟上面的大人物談判，好讓你被拘捕後重獲自由。

orig_text: Know your enemy. There are two different kinds of Shields units, some are equipped with lights and SMGs, and the others carries a pistol.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。持盾警察有兩種，分別是持手槍的普通版，以及裝備帶燈盾牌及衝鋒槍的強力版本。

orig_text: Sniper Rifles can shoot through Shields and armor, and even multiple enemies.
tran_text: 狙擊槍可以射穿盾牌和防彈護甲，甚至好幾個敵人。

orig_text: Know your enemy. The ZEAL units all wear urban camouflage, making it harder to identify who has additional armor.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。ZEAL 部隊全員身穿都市迷彩服，讓你更難辨別誰穿著更厚的裝甲。

orig_text: Know your enemy. The SWAT turret can be identified by being attached to a huge SWAT van.
tran_text: 認識你的敵人。SWAT 炮台就是長在 SWAT 裝甲車的車頂上。

orig_text: Are you low on ammo? Look around on the ground, because dead cops drop ammo boxes.
tran_text: 你沒子彈了嗎？看看四周的地板上有沒有警察被殺後留下來的子彈盒。

orig_text: The Medic Skill Subtree is all about keeping you and your fellow heisters healthy and alive.
tran_text: 黑手技能樹的醫護兵分枝裡頭，都是些如何令你和你的隊友能活得更健康長久的技能。

orig_text: The Shotgunner Skill Subtree provides massive boosts when using Shotguns.
tran_text: 暴徒技能樹的霰彈槍手分枝在你使用霰彈槍時提供大量能力加乘。

orig_text: The Tank Skill Subtree makes you stronger and more resilient.
tran_text: 暴徒技能樹的坦克分枝會令你更加強壯更耐打。

orig_text: The Ammo Specialist Skill Subtree is focused around ammunition. It also has skills to improve the OVE9000 Saw.
tran_text: 暴徒技能樹的彈藥專家分枝主要集中於子彈供應上，亦包含強化 OVE9000 電鋸的技能。

orig_text: The Oppressor Skill Subtree focuses boost your auto-fire weapons, making them even more effective.
tran_text: 技師技能樹的壓制者分枝大幅提升使用自動武器的效率。

orig_text: The Artful Dodger Skill Subtree focuses on speed, and the ability to dodge gunfire if you have good Concealment.
tran_text: 鬼魅技能樹的扒手分枝主要集中於提升速度，你的隱匿值夠好的話更能提升躲閃子彈的能力。

orig_text: Special Enemies are gradually introduced for each difficulty from hard and above.
tran_text: 從「困難」難度開始，特殊敵人的種類和數量會隨住難度提升而逐漸增加。

orig_text: The Feign Death Skill in the Revenant Skill Subtree gives you a chance to get back up on your own after getting downed.
tran_text: 逃犯技能樹的復仇者分枝當中的「詐死」技能能令你在倒地後有機會即時復活。

orig_text: Don't leave bags unattended - cops may be inclined to steal your precious loot.
tran_text: 別任由贓物袋子棄置於地上不管－－警察會偷走你辛苦勞動的成果的。

orig_text: Gage Mod Courier Packages will grant the team a free EXP bonus, regardless if they own the Gage Mod Courier DLC or not.
tran_text: 取得 Gage 配件速遞包裹即令隊伍全員獲得小量額外經驗值，就算隊友沒購買配件速遞包DLC亦可受惠。

orig_text: If you're playing by yourself, without Team-AI or other players - Cloakers won't charge you.
tran_text: 當你是單獨遊玩，而且沒有 AI 隊友或玩家在場時，Cloakers 潛伏者將不會對你使用必殺飛踢。

orig_text: Tasing an enemy makes them a lot easier to Dominate.
tran_text: 被電擊的警察會較易投降。

orig_text: Tasers can pin down your teammates, kill the Taser to help your teammates.
tran_text: Tasers 電擊兵會電擊你的隊友，殺了他就能拯救隊友。

orig_text: A silencer if very helpful when trying to sneakily complete a heist so your gunshot can't be heard.
tran_text: 如果你想靜靜地完成劫案，請善用消音器配件令你的槍聲難以被人察覺。

orig_text: Some weapons have alternate Fire Modes, where you can switch between single-fire and auto-fire.
tran_text: 部分武器可切換開火模式，你可因應需要即時切換成單發射擊、三點放或全自動射擊。

orig_text: Marking Special Enemies makes it easier for your teammates to identify them.
tran_text: 善用「標記」功能將特殊敵人標示出來以便隊友應對。

orig_text: The higher the Threat Level of your weapons, the more likely it is that enemies will try to dodge.
tran_text: 武器的威脅值越高，越高機會使敵人去躲避你的槍擊。

orig_text: Mind your surroundings, if you kill a Civilian you will pay a penalty from your spending cash.
tran_text: 小心周遭平民，要是你錯手殺了平民就會即時從你的戶口扣除善後費用以作懲罰。

orig_text: You can press the "Shout/Interact" button to try to force a police officer to surrender and become a hostage.
tran_text: 你可以對警察按「呼喝／互動鍵」來逼使他投降並成為人質。

orig_text: Is your screen turning grey? You should probably use a Doctor Bag.
tran_text: 你的人生突然變成一片灰白色？那表示你該去用醫療包了。

orig_text: A Doctor Bag will refill your lives and a First Aid Kit will only refill your health.
tran_text: 醫療包會恢復你的血量和倒地次數，急救包則只會恢復你的血量。

orig_text: You can't trade a hostage during an assault, you need to wait until the assault is over.
tran_text: 攻堅時段是不能交換人質的，你只能等待攻堅完畢才行。

orig_text: Guards will become suspicious about a destroyed camera. Civilians, on the other hand, don't care.
tran_text: 損壞的監視鏡頭會吸引警衛注意，但平民是不會理會的。

orig_text: If a Cloaker is charging at you - aim at his head.
tran_text: 要是你見到有 Cloaker 潛伏者正衝向你飛踢－－請瞄頭開槍制止他。

orig_text: Cloakers are not affected by the Feedback Loop of an ECM Jammer.
tran_text: Cloakers 潛伏者不受ECM干擾器的反饋功能所影響。

orig_text: After shooting with a any type of Bow, don't forget to pick up your arrows.
tran_text: 別忘記回收你用弓弩射出去的箭矢。

orig_text: Just because you're not masked up, doesn't mean you're invisible. Civilians might not be able to tell you're packing heat, but guards and cameras will.
tran_text: 你沒戴上面具，不表示你是隱形人。平民百姓或者看不見你藏在西裝下的槍械，但還是瞞不過警衛和監視鏡頭的。

orig_text: Bulldozers can come charging at you when you least expect it. Stay on your toes.
tran_text: 重裝兵 Bulldozers 會趁你一個不留神時衝向你，千萬別大意。

orig_text: Killing cops is important, but you can't complete a heist without clearing objectives.
tran_text: 記住，你是來打劫的。殺警察雖然也重要，但只有達成任務才能完成劫案。

orig_text: Sensor mines are useful for keeping track of guards in Stealth.
tran_text: 潛行時，善用詭雷的感應模式來掌握警衛的動向。

orig_text: Keep an eye out for current objectives in the top left corner.
tran_text: 不知道自己該做什麼時，請看左上角的任務指示。

orig_text: Flashbangs will beep and blink red before they detonate.
tran_text: 閃光彈在引爆之前會鳴叫和閃爍紅燈的。

orig_text: Stick together to increase survivability. Or split up to do objectives faster.
tran_text: 集中一起，可提升生存率；分頭行動，可加快完成任務的速度。

orig_text: Remember a lone player is an easy target for Cloakers.
tran_text: 請記住，潛伏者 Cloakers 最喜歡做的事，莫過於一脚踢爆落單的人的屁眼。

orig_text: Use cover, the enemies can quickly take you down if you are out in the open.
tran_text: 請善用掩體，站在開揚的地方駁火只會令你變成蜜蜂巢。

orig_text: Be careful where you place your bags, if a guard or a civilian sees it, they will sound the alarm.
tran_text: 包包切勿隨處亂放，被警衛或平民發現的話就有機會報警。

orig_text: ECM Jammers will block the guard's radios, civilian cellphones and cameras so they can't alert the cops to your presence while the ECM jammer is active.
tran_text: ECM 干擾器發動時，可令警衛的無線電、平民的手機和監視鏡頭暫停運作，這段時間內他們將無法報警。

orig_text: Loot isn't divided between players in the lobby. Everyone gets the full amount.
tran_text: 贓款不會因為參與劫案的人數增加而分薄了。大家都會拿到贓款的全額。

orig_text: Some guards have a set patrol during Stealth, use this to your advantage.
tran_text: 潛行期間，部分警衛的巡邏路線是固定的，請善用此優勢。

orig_text: Don't run out of cover without checking if Snipers are present as they could deplete your health even with a full armor.
tran_text: 離開掩體前留意附近有沒有狙擊手，他們可以一槍把護甲值全滿的你打成重傷。

orig_text: Crouching will help you get less detected in Stealth.
tran_text: 潛行時，蹲下可減少你被發現的機會。

orig_text: Captain Winters will retreat when he has taken enough damage or if several of his men have fallen.
tran_text: 只要 Captain Winters 受到重創，或是他的部下們被擊倒，就能迫使他撤退。

orig_text: You have a small chance to obtain one Cable Tie upon an ammo pickup.
tran_text: 每當你拾起彈藥盒時，都有小機會獲得一條縛帶。

orig_text: If you are joining a stealthable heist, ask if it's OK to join before pressing "Ready".
tran_text: 如果你打算中途加入一場可潛行的劫案，請先向房主詢問現在是否加入的適當時機，才好按下「準備」。

orig_text: Some achievements unlock Weapons, Mods or Masks.
tran_text: 一部分遊戲成就可解鎖武器、配件和面具。

orig_text: If you are new to the game you might want to try out our "The Basics" heists - they can be found on Crime.net.
tran_text: 你新來的？或者你該試試我們最新的「基本教學」劫案－－就在 Crime.net 裡。

orig_text: You can use the FBI files from the game menu to read about your teammates.
tran_text: 你可以利用遊戲主選單中的「FBI 檔案」來查看隊友的詳細資料。

orig_text: More loot means more rewards but could also mean higher risk.
tran_text: 更多的贓物代表更多的獎賞，亦同時代表更多的風險。

orig_text: Looking for a weapon mod? Do the Daily Tasks found in the Safe House.
tran_text: 想要更多武器配件？去完成安全屋的每日任務吧。

orig_text: Remember to check the Perk Decks frequently to spend Perk Points.
tran_text: 記得要多點去牌組畫面，花費牌組點數好去學習新技能。

orig_text: Don't expect that your heist will be the same if you replay it as vaults, assets and key items are randomized and will be at different locations each time you play it.
tran_text: 就算是同一個劫案，你每次遊玩時都不會一樣。保險箱、輔助工具及重要道具等的位置都不盡相同。

orig_text: Join the Payday community on the Steam Store Page to gain access to some extra free and unique content.
tran_text: 加入 Payday 群組就能免費獲得獨家內容，像是新的武器和面具。群組就在 Steam 商店頁面內。

orig_text: Cleaner Costs are immediately deducted from your Spending Cash, so restarting a heist will not revert Cleaner Costs.
tran_text: 殺死平民的善後費用是會即時從你的現金戶口中扣除，所以就算你重新開始劫案，善後費用也不會退還給你。

orig_text: Many weapons have an extended reload time if there are no bullets left in the magazine.
tran_text: 大部分武器在花光了彈匣裡頭的子彈時，重新上彈都會額外花費時間去上鏜。

orig_text: You don't need to own a DLC heist to be able to play it. You can't host lobbies that are playing that DLC heist unless you own the DLC.
tran_text: 就算你沒有購買 DLC 劫案，你還是能加入並遊玩其他玩家所主持的 DLC 劫案，只是當你是房主時你將不能主持這類劫案。

orig_text: If the escape is available, remember to leave when you think it's best. All that money won't be worth it if you get thrown into custody.
tran_text: 當劫案完成可以逃走時，請謹慎選擇逃跑的時機。因為在這時全員被捕而劫案失敗的話，你們還是一毛錢也拿不到的。

orig_text: The Elephant will reward you for doing things quietly, but going loud is an option when in a pinch.
tran_text: 政客 Elephant 很怕麻煩，所以如果你能以潛行方式完成他的委託，他會好好打賞你，當然你也可以選擇火併完成。

orig_text: Some bags are heavier than others. Make sure that the player with the lowest armor carries the heaviest bag and vice versa.
tran_text: 贓物各有輕重，最重的贓物包請交由穿輕裝的隊友負責運送，身穿重護甲還背著重包包的話你會連走路都成問題。

orig_text: When in Stealth, consider if you need to bring Body Bags or ECM Jammers to better fit your team´s composition
tran_text: 潛行時，請視乎隊員的構成來考慮到底帶屍袋箱還是 ECM 干擾器上場。

orig_text: Know your enemy. There are three kinds of Bulldozers: Green, Black, and Skulldozers. Each wields a different weapon.
tran_text: 敵人小知識：重裝兵 Bulldozers 有三種：小綠、小黑，以及骷髏版本。每一種所持有的武器都不同。

orig_text: Shields will often come in groups, make sure you have a plan to deal with them.
tran_text: 盾牌兵多是三五成群的一起出動，確保你們有制訂出對付他們的方法。

orig_text: Combat is rarely the motive, but rather the method.
tran_text: 戰鬥不求動機高尚，但求手段正確。

orig_text: Bain will offer smaller jobs that can be completed both Loud or in Stealth. They can often be done quick and he has a few good jobs for beginners.
tran_text: Bain 的委託都是小差事，通常很快就能完成，而且潛行火併皆可，最適合新手選擇。

orig_text: It is better to have multiple Skill Sets that are good at different things, than to have one Skill Set that tries to do a bit of everything.
tran_text: 寧願設置好幾套技能組合，每個組合都各自擅長於某一方面，而不是一套什麼都能做，卻什麼都不專精的所謂萬能組合。

orig_text: If Bain screams that someone is in a pickle - your teammates needs help.
tran_text: 要是 Bain 大叫某人遇上了麻煩－－那個人肯定需要你的拯救。

orig_text: The Butcher's Gun Trade business reaches all around the globe. She has her eyes on one-of-a-kind weaponry to steal and she knows how to settle a score.
tran_text: Butcher 的槍械走私事業遍及全球，任何罕見武器的情報都瞞不過她的線眼，任何想找她麻煩的傢伙都逃不過她的五指山。

orig_text: Scarface likes his Safe House room but keeps dreaming of a mansion in Miami.
tran_text: Scarface 雖然喜歡安全屋的私人房間，但他還是朝思暮想他在邁阿密的私人別墅。
Hoxton 在英格蘭的「雪埠」謝菲爾德市長大。

orig_text: Sydney is a pretty good swimmer.
John Wick is sometimes called Baba Yaga, after a Slavic folklore figure.
tran_text: John Wick 的綽號「Baba Yaga」，出自斯拉夫民間傳說中之女巫「芭芭雅嘎｣。

orig_text: John Wick is back. He's definitely back.
tran_text: John Wick 復出了，他真的重出江湖了。

orig_text: Bain's favorite color might be blue. But maybe it isn't. Maybe it's red. Maybe he doesn't have one.
tran_text: Bain 最喜歡的顏色應該是藍色，又或者不是。可能他喜歡紅色，又或者他根本沒有喜歡的顏色。

orig_text: Bain doesn't approve of needless killing of civilians.
tran_text: Bain 從不允許任何不必要的平民死傷。

orig_text: Everyone knows Bain's name. No one knows his identity.
tran_text: 誰都知道 Bain 的名字就叫做 Bain，但無人知道他的底細。

orig_text: Dallas is the informal leader of the Payday Gang.
tran_text: Dallas 可說是 Payday 幫的精神領袖。

orig_text: Dallas is not from Texas, he's from Chicago.
tran_text: Dallas 不是來自德克薩斯州，而是芝加哥。

orig_text: Wolf used to work as a game developer in Sweden.
tran_text: Wolf 曾經在瑞典做過遊戲開發者。

orig_text: Wolf is not a healthy human being.
Bodhi spends a fortune on surfboards.
tran_text: Bodhi 把錢都花在滑浪板上。

orig_text: Chains spends a fortune on guns.
tran_text: Chains 把血汗錢都花在槍械上。

orig_text: Chains used to be a military man but he didn't fit in. As a bank robber, he's a natural.
tran_text: Chains 曾經從軍但似乎無所適從，不過作為銀行劫匪來說他確實擁有天份。

orig_text: Chains is sometimes in a pickle.
Clover has had a long and complicated relationship with Hoxton, since before the Payday Gang. They get on well now, though.
tran_text: 在 Payday 幫成立以前，Clover 跟 Hoxton 有過一段不算短的孽緣。倒是最近這兩人相處得不錯。

orig_text: Clover is a fan of The Walking Dead.
Houston spends a fortune on cars.
tran_text: Houston 將錢都用在汽車上。

orig_text: Bonnie spends a fortune on whisky.
tran_text: Bonnie 把錢都花在威士忌上。

orig_text: Bonnie probably gambles too much. But it wouldn't be safe to tell her that.
tran_text: Bonnie 沉迷賭搏，但似乎誰都沒有勇氣告訴她這件事。

orig_text: Captain Winters spends a fortune on protective gear.
tran_text: Captain Winters 把錢都花在護甲上。

orig_text: Captain Winters used to be in the Military Police before he joined GenSec.
tran_text: Captain Winters 在加入 GenSec 之前曾經做過憲兵。

orig_text: Rust spends a fortune on his bike.
tran_text: Rust 把錢都花在他的寶貝重機車上。

orig_text: Sokol still maintains the physique of a professional athlete.
tran_text: Sokol 依然維持著專業選手的體能。

orig_text: Jiro spends a fortune on sword maintenance.
tran_text: Jiro 會花錢去保養他的日本刀。

orig_text: Jiro's relationship to American food is marked more by tolerance than appreciation.
tran_text: Jiro 並沒多欣賞美國的飲食文化－－他只當成苦行的一部分。

orig_text: Dragan used to be a cop in Croatia.
tran_text: Dragan 曾經是克羅埃西亞共和國的警察。

orig_text: Dragan was introduced to the Payday Gang by the Butcher.
tran_text: Dragan 是經由 Butcher 介紹而加入 Payday 幫。

orig_text: Aldstone spends a fortune on specially imported tea.
tran_text: Aldstone 把錢都花在高檔入口茶葉上。

orig_text: Jacket spends a fortune on batteries.
tran_text: Jacket 把錢都花在買乾電池上去。

orig_text: Aldstone's first name is unknown to all the heisters except Hoxton, who never uses it.
tran_text: 劫匪們都不知道 Aldstone 的姓氏，除了 Hoxton，但他從沒說過。

orig_text: Aldstone was once married, but it didn't end happily.
tran_text: Aldstone 結過婚，但不是愉快收場。

orig_text: Gage spends a fortune on bribing customs officials.
tran_text: Gage 把錢都花在賄賂關員身上。

orig_text: Gage is often underestimated, something which he uses to his advantage.
tran_text: Gage 常常被人小看，而他亦不時利用這一點佔得好處。

orig_text: Gage has an extensive net of contacts around the world, allowing him to procure the very best hardware available.
tran_text: Gage 在全球各地都有豐富的人脈，讓他可以入口最好的槍械。

orig_text: Bob McKendrick spends a fortune on influence-peddling.
tran_text: Bob McKendrick 把錢都用來打通人脈以助他以權謀私。

orig_text: Bob McKendrick is a political veteran of many battles and has gone through many ups and downs during his career.
tran_text: Bob McKendrick 是個老練的政客，在他的政治生涯經歷過無數起跌才有今時今日的成就。

orig_text: Bob McKendrick is not to be underestimated.
The Butcher's family has been running guns for several generations.
tran_text: Butcher 的家族從事走私軍火的事業好幾代了。

orig_text: The Butcher's signature and mode of operation is to transport guns inside frozen animal carcasses.
tran_text: Butcher 最為人熟知的走私軍火方式就是利用急凍的動物屍體。

orig_text: Jiro doesn't like the Cloaker. He cuts their head off with his Katana.
tran_text: Jiro 不喜歡潛伏者 Cloaker。他甚至會用日本刀斬下他們的頭。

orig_text: No animals were hurt during the making of the Goat Simulator Heist.
tran_text: 在製作 Goat Simulator Heist 的過程中沒有動物受到傷害。

orig_text: Hector is a man of serious business. He doesn't like his operations in D.C. to be trampled on. Expect long loud heists from this guy.
tran_text: Hector 對他的事業十分認真。他討厭他在華盛頓D.C.的產業遭到他人踐踏。他的委託就意味住長時間的火併任務。

orig_text: The Dentist's jobs require careful planning and finesse. If you think you're ready, give him a call.
tran_text: 牙醫 Dentist 的委託需要周長的計劃和靈巧的身手。要是你已準備好，就跟他聯絡吧。

orig_text: The Classics. These jobs were the biggest things the gang's ever done. Let's say we see if they still have what it takes?
tran_text: 經典劫案，這些都是前代 Payday 幫完成過的大型劫案。你有沒興趣再一次試試自己的身手？

orig_text: Locke is a greedy ex-mercenary from Murkywater. He'll assign jobs that more or less always involve his former employer.
tran_text: Locke 這個貪心鬼是私人軍企 Murkywater 的前傭兵，他委託的工作多少都與他的老東家有關。

orig_text: Make your way further along the bridge and locate the prison convoy.
tran_text: 沿著大橋前進並找出囚車車隊。

orig_text: Locate the prisoner! He's in one of the trucks. Saw the doors open.
tran_text: 找出那名囚犯！他就在其中一輛車內。鋸開車門。

orig_text: Escort the prisoner to the scaffolding
Hold the tower, wait for the airplane and make sure the pilot snatches up the chair!
tran_text: 死守這座塔，等待飛機來到，確保機師成功釣走椅子！

orig_text: Send up the Balloon so George can fly in and pick up the Ejection Seat.
tran_text: 升起氣球，以便機師 George 飛過來並帶走逃生椅。

orig_text: Make it to the Bridge Pillar and take the stairs to the waiting scuba gear.
tran_text: 撤退至橋墩，走下樓梯到放置了潛水裝備的地方。
抓住 Matt 並拿回公事包！

orig_text: Clear this area of cops, or Bile will have to look for another spot to pick you up.
tran_text: 除去這範圍的條子，否則 Alex 會找另一個位置接你。

orig_text: Clear the Landing Zone of Cops
tran_text: 除去這範圍的條子 ( 阿米蒂奇大道 )

orig_text: Get Matt to the rope ladder under the helicopter and rally the team around it.
tran_text: 護送 Matt 到直昇機下的繩梯。
下去找直昇機 ( 阿米蒂奇大道 )

orig_text: Move forward and meet up with Eddie the driver and his car.
tran_text: 在 Bruce 的車前頭見他。

orig_text: Get Matt back to Jake's parking lot. You will get further instructions when you're there.
tran_text: 帶 Matt 回到 Jake 的停車場，你到時會有更多指示。

orig_text: Move to the Parking Lot with Matt
tran_text: 逼 Matt 去停車場 ( Jake 的停車場 )

orig_text: Matt's ride crashed not far from here, hurry up and you'll catch him.
tran_text: Matt 的車在附近撞毀了，快去拿回公事包。
到達撞車地點 ( 簡易街 )
繼續追 Matt ( 主要大道 )

orig_text: Bile will pick you up soon, dig in!
tran_text: Alex 會盡快回來接你們了，支撐住！
